TEXT.English: Agriculture is Nature's own economic system, and as with all of her designs, it is far superior to the feeble imitations we have managed to create. Imagine the great rewards that can be achieved by a deposit of but a single seed, and then show me a banker who would pay an equal interest.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Dengrahl Lern, Merchant[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: L'Agriculture est le propre système économique de la Nature, et comme toutes ses créations, c'est grandement supérieur à toutes les pâles imitations que nous ayons créé. Imaginez la forte récompense que l'on peut obtenir par le dépôt d'un simple graine, et alors montrez-moi un banquier qui payerait un intérêt équivalent.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Dengrahl Lern, Marchand[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Landwirtschaft ist der Natur eigenes ökonomisches System. Und wie alle ihre Entwicklungen ist auch diese unseren schwachen Imitationen, die wir geschafft haben zu kreieren, bei weitem überlegen. Stell dir die großen Errungenschaften vor, die durch die Saat eines einzelnen Samen erreicht werden können, und dann zeige mir einen Bankier, der ein gleiches Maß an Einsatz zeigt. - Dengrahl Lern, Kaufmann
TEXT.Italian: Agriculture is Nature's own economic system, and as with all of her designs, it is far superior to the feeble imitations we have managed to create. Imagine the great rewards that can be achieved by a deposit of but a single seed, and then show me a banker who would pay an equal interest.-Dengrahl Lern, Merchant
TEXT.Spanish: Agriculture is Nature's own economic system, and as with all of her designs, it is far superior to the feeble imitations we have managed to create. Imagine the great rewards that can be achieved by a deposit of but a single seed, and then show me a banker who would pay an equal interest.-Dengrahl Lern, Merchant

TEXT.English: There are some ways to tell the difference between a real sheep and one that has been polymorphed from a man. The latter will show greater fear and curiosity. It will not seek out its own kind. But they both taste the same.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gaylin Wayforth, mage and amateur chef[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Il y a plusieurs façons de distinguer un vrai mouton d'un humain polymorphé. Ce dernier montrera plus de peur et de curiosité ; il ne cherchera pas ses pairs. Mais les deux ont le même goût.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gaylin Wayforth, mage et cuisinier amateur[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Es gibt einige Wege, um den Unterschied zwischen einem echten Schaf und einem Schaf festzustellen, dass durch den Menschen gezüchtet wurde. Das Letztere wird größere Angst und Neugier zeigen. Es wird nicht Tiere außerhalb der eigenen Gattung begehren. Aber beide schmecken gleich. - Gaylin Wayforth, Magier und Amateurkoch
TEXT.Italian: There are some ways to tell the difference between a real sheep and one that has been polymorphed from a man. The latter will show greater fear and curiosity. It will not seek out its own kind. But they both taste the same.-Gaylin Wayforth, mage and amateur chef
TEXT.Spanish: There are some ways to tell the difference between a real sheep and one that has been polymorphed from a man. The latter will show greater fear and curiosity. It will not seek out its own kind. But they both taste the same.-Gaylin Wayforth, mage and amateur chef

TEXT.English: Even in the distant past, before the Gods had revealed their divine presence to us, we still felt an unidentifiable longing, a yearning for some greater purpose, and some guidelines for our existence. Even then, a part of us must have known.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Scholar[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Même aux premiers jours, bien avant que les Dieux ne nous aient révélé leur divine présence, nous avions toujours eu la sensation d'un besoin inidentifiable, le désir d'un but profond, et de directives pour notre vie. Même alors, une partie d'entre devaient savoir.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Erudit[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Selbst in der fernen Vergangenheit, bevor die Götter uns ihre göttliche Präsenz enthüllt hatten, fühlten wir ein unerklärliches Verlangen, eine Sehnsucht nach einem größeren Ziel, und nach irgendeinem Leitfaden für unsere Existenz. Selbst damals muss es ein Teil von uns gewusst haben. - Jobin Seras, Gelehrter
TEXT.Italian: Even in the distant past, before the Gods had revealed their divine presence to us, we still felt an unidentifiable longing, a yearning for some greater purpose, and some guidelines for our existence. Even then, a part of us must have known.-Jobin Seras, Scholar
TEXT.Spanish: Even in the distant past, before the Gods had revealed their divine presence to us, we still felt an unidentifiable longing, a yearning for some greater purpose, and some guidelines for our existence. Even then, a part of us must have known.-Jobin Seras, Scholar

TEXT.English: Animals have always been reluctant to come near humans, because we have always been at the top of the food chain. The first step in gaining the trust of an animal is to make it understand that you do not seek to eat it. The second is to make it understand that it should not try to eat you. Once this mutual understanding is established, the rest comes easily.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Keron Maes, Ranger[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Les animaux ont toujours été réticents à s'approcher des humains, parce que nous avons toujours été au sommet de la chaîne alimentaire. Le premier pas pour gagner la confiance d'un animal est de lui faire comprendre que vous ne cherchez pas à le manger. Le deuxième est de lui faire comprendre qu'il ne devrait pas essayer de vous manger. Dès que cette compréhension réciproque est établie, le reste vient facilement.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Keron Maes, Garde-Forestier[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Tieren hat es immer widerstrebt, sich dem Menschen zu nähern, da wir immer an der Spitze der Nahrungskette standen. Der erste Schritt, um das Vertrauen eines Tieres zu gewinnen, ist es, ihm begreiflich zu machen, dass du nicht vorhast es zu verspeisen. Der zweite ist, ihm begreiflich zu machen, dass es nicht versuchen sollte, dich zu verspeisen. Ist dieses gegenseitige Verständnis einmal etabliert, ergibt sich der Rest von selbst. - Keron Maes, Waldläufer
TEXT.Italian: Animals have always been reluctant to come near humans, because we have always been at the top of the food chain. The first step in gaining the trust of an animal is to make it understand that you do not seek to eat it. The second is to make it understand that it should not try to eat you. Once this mutual understanding is established, the rest comes easily.- Keron Maes, Ranger
TEXT.Spanish: Animals have always been reluctant to come near humans, because we have always been at the top of the food chain. The first step in gaining the trust of an animal is to make it understand that you do not seek to eat it. The second is to make it understand that it should not try to eat you. Once this mutual understanding is established, the rest comes easily.- Keron Maes, Ranger

TEXT.English: Animal Husbandry

All of mankind, with the dread exception of the followers of the Overlords, have always strongly resented slavery, on the grounds that no being should be completely subject to another. Oddly enough, this view has never been put forth in regard to Man's fellow animals...[NEWLINE][BOLD]Selena Yera, Elven Mystic[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Toute l'humanité, à l'exception des effroyables disciples des Suzerains, ont toujours eu une forte rancœur envers l'esclavage, en raison du fait qu'aucun être ne devrait être soumis complètement à un autre. Assez étrangement, ce point de vue n'a jamais été appliqué en ce qui concerne les animaux...[NEWLINE][BOLD]Selena Yera, Mystique Elfe[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Alle Völker, mit der traurigen Ausnahme der Anhänger der Schatten, haben immer aufs stärkste die Sklaverei abgelehnt, basierend auf dem Prinzip, dass kein Lebewesen das komplette Eigentum eines anderem seien sollte. Seltsam nur, dass diese Sicht niemals auf unsere tierischen Begleiter ausgeweitet wurde... - Selena Yera, Elfenesoterikerin
TEXT.Italian: All of mankind, with the dread exception of the followers of the Overlords, have always strongly resented slavery, on the grounds that no being should be completely subject to another. Oddly enough, this view has never been put forth in regard to Man's fellow animals...-Selena Yera, Elven Mystic
TEXT.Spanish: All of mankind, with the dread exception of the followers of the Overlords, have always strongly resented slavery, on the grounds that no being should be completely subject to another. Oddly enough, this view has never been put forth in regard to Man's fellow animals...-Selena Yera, Elven Mystic

TEXT.English: It's a rough world out there. Beyond the palisades, wild and ferocious animals roam the forests, and even more mysterious beasts wander across the plains. Most of the time they leave us alone, settling for eating the few wanderers who go astray. Once in a while they come for us, and thankfully, we are always ready to receive them.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gerod Jiz, Farmer[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: C'est un monde dangereux là-bas. Au-delà des palissades, des animaux sauvages et féroces rodent dans les forêts, et des bêtes encore plus mystérieuses errent à travers les plaines. La plupart du temps ils nous laissent en paix, se contentant de manger les quelques pauvres hères s'égarant. De temps en temps, ils viennent pour nous, et heureusement, nous sommes toujours prêts à les recevoir.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gerod Jiz, Fermier[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Die Welt dort draußen ist rau. Jenseits der Palisaden streifen wilde und grausame Tiere durch die Wälder und noch geheimnisvollere Bestien wandern durch die Prärie. Die meiste Zeit lassen sie uns in Frieden und begnügen sich damit ein paar verirrte Wanderer zu fressen. Doch hin und wieder kommen sie um uns zu holen. Aber glücklicherweise sind wir stets bereit sie zu empfangen. - Gerod Jiz, Bauer
TEXT.Italian: It's a rough world out there. Beyond the palisades, wild and ferocious animals roam the forests, and even more mysterious beasts wander across the plains. Most of the time they leave us alone, settling for eating the few wanderers who go astray. Once in a while they come for us, and thankfully, we are always ready to receive them.-Gerod Jiz, Farmer
TEXT.Spanish: It's a rough world out there. Beyond the palisades, wild and ferocious animals roam the forests, and even more mysterious beasts wander across the plains. Most of the time they leave us alone, settling for eating the few wanderers who go astray. Once in a while they come for us, and thankfully, we are always ready to receive them.-Gerod Jiz, Farmer

TEXT.French: Sorts magiques et rites sacrés ; Appris d'un grimoire s'embrasant ; Dans le rougeoiement fugitif d'un feu obscur ; Le puissant à l'égal du faible[NEWLINE][BOLD]Aldorien Lunargent, Ménestrel elfique[\BOLD]

TEXT.English: Granted, the humans have strength of arms, and quite adequate tools for the job. But, what good is that, when they don't have a clue where to dig?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Osmand Rockspittle, Mining Supervisor[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Bien leur en fasse, les humains ont des bras forts, et des outils adéquats. Mais en quoi leur est-ce utile s'ils ne savent où creuser ?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Osmand Rockspittle, Contre-Maître Minier[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Zugegeben, die Menschen haben starke Arme und so ziemlich die passenden Werkzeuge für die Arbeit. Aber was nützt das, wenn sie keinen Schimmer haben wo sie graben müssen? - Osmand Steinspalter, Mienenaufseher

TEXT.English: A good seat? He said that? The Kings favor gives righteousness, good virtue will *seal* a heart. If we're talking horses I'll take a chain and some steel plate. With all that you can ride down a self-styled "Bandit Lord."[NEWLINE][BOLD]Knight-Sheriff Guval[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: A good seat? He said that? The Kings favor gives righteousness, good virtue will *seal* a heart. If we're talking horses I'll take a chain and some steel plate. With all that you can ride down a self-styled "Bandit Lord."[NEWLINE][BOLD]Knight-Sheriff Guval[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Ein guter Sitz? Hatte er das gesagt? Die Könige bevorzugen Aufrichtigkeit, Tugend wird das Herz 'versiegeln'. Wenn wir von Pferden reden, dann reicht auch eine Kette und eine Stahlplatte. Allein damit kann man einen selbsternannten "Räuberkönig" niedereiten. - Ritter Guval
TEXT.Italian: A good seat? He said that? The Kings favor gives righteousness, good virtue will *seal* a heart. If we're talking horses I'll take a chain and some steel plate. With all that you can ride down a self-styled "Bandit Lord." - Knight-Sheriff Guval

TEXT.German: Jene, die ihr Glück in den Sternen suchen, werden nicht den Pfad erkennen, der sich direkt vor ihnen erstreckt. - Kirin Mistfall, Mystikerin

TEXT.English: There is a cure for vampirism. It involves the long barrel of a gun and large doses of splintered iron and powder.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Teutorix[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Le vampirisme n'est pas une maladie incurable. Le remède implique le canon d'un fusil et de copieuses doses de poudre et d'acier.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Teutorix[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Ich habe ihn gewarnt! Ich sagte ihm, er solle vorsichtig sein! Nichtsdestotrotz erhitzte er die Substanz weiter, und binnen weniger Sekunden war der arme alte Meister Keli über die gesamten Wände des Laboratoriums verteilt. - Elon Ryar, Alchemistenlehrling
TEXT.Italian: There is a cure for vampirism. It involves the long barrel of a gun and large doses of splintered iron and powder.-Teutorix

TEXT.English: Let fly these feathered messengers, harbingers of better times, those that speak for common men and punish lords for unjust crimes.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Chronicles of the Wind[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Laissez voler ces messagers emplumés, funestes présages de temps meilleurs, ceux qui parlent pour les humbles et punissent les seigneurs pour leurs crimes injustes.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Les Chroniques du Vent[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Möge dieser gefiederte Bote davon fliegen, sei er ein Bote besserer Zeiten für die, die sich für den einfachen Manne einsetzen und bestrafe er die Fürsten für ihre ungerechten Verbrechen. - Chroniken des Windes

TEXT.English: The sun begins its journey;[NEWLINE] Across the sky once more;[NEWLINE]As future flies towards the past;[NEWLINE]And now becomes before[NEWLINE][BOLD]Aldorien Silvermoon, Elven Bard[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Le soleil commence son voyage ; À travers le ciel encore une fois ; Comme l'avenir vole vers le passé ; Et maintenant devient auparavant[NEWLINE][BOLD]Aldorien Lunargent, Ménestrel elfique[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Die Sonne beginnt ihre Reise;[NEWLINE]Auf ein neues über den Himmel;[NEWLINE]Während die Zukunft Richtung Vergangenheit fliegt;[NEWLINE]Und das Jetzt wird zum Damals. - Aldorien Silbermond, Elfenbarde
TEXT.Italian: The sun begins its journey;[NEWLINE] Across the sky once more;[NEWLINE]As future flies towards the past;[NEWLINE]And now becomes before-Aldorien Silvermoon, Elven Bard

TEXT.German: Kartografie
TEXT.Italian: Cartography
TEXT.Spanish: Cartography

TEXT.English: A map is a nothing more than a drawing on a piece of parchment. Yet, at the same time, it is the whole world in the palm of your hand. Maps are powerful tools and dangerous weapons. Do not underestimate them, and always make sure your maps are better than those of the enemy.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Kriss Bechaal, Knight Commander of the Bannor[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Une carte n'est un rien d'autre qu'un dessin sur un parchemin. Pourtant, en même temps, c'est le monde entier dans la paume de votre main. Les cartes sont des instruments puissants et des armes dangereuses. Ne les sous-estimez pas et assurez-vous toujours que vos cartes sont meilleures que celles de l'ennemi.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Kriss Bechaal, Chevalier Commandant des Bannoriens[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Eine Karte ist nichts weiter als eine Zeichnung auf einem Stück Pergament. Dennoch ist es zur gleichen Zeit die gesamte Welt in der Größe der Hand. Waffen sind mächtige Werkzeuge und sehr gefährlich. Unterschätze sie nicht und stelle stets sicher, dass deine Karten besser sind als die des Feindes. - Kriss Bechaal, Ritterkommandeur der Bannor
TEXT.Italian: A map is a nothing more than a drawing on a piece of parchment. Yet, at the same time, it is the whole world in the palm of your hand. Maps are powerful tools and dangerous weapons. Do not underestimate them, and always make sure your maps are better than those of the enemy.-Kriss Bechaal, Knight Commander of the Bannor
TEXT.Spanish: A map is a nothing more than a drawing on a piece of parchment. Yet, at the same time, it is the whole world in the palm of your hand. Maps are powerful tools and dangerous weapons. Do not underestimate them, and always make sure your maps are better than those of the enemy.-Kriss Bechaal, Knight Commander of the Bannor

TEXT.English: Laws, and their effective enforcement, are the foundation of any ordered society. Whenever common citizens start to question the letter of the law, anarchy is never far behind, and, therefore, upholding the law must come before all other concerns.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Maer de Vain, Confessor of the Order[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Les lois et leurs mises en application efficaces, sont les fondations de toute société organisée. Chaque fois que des citoyens communs critique la lettre de la Loi, l'anarchie n'est jamais loin, et le soutien de la loi doit venir avant toute autre considération.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Maer de Vain, Confesseur de l'Ordre[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Gesetze und deren effektive Durchsetzung sind die Grundlagen jeder geregelten Gesellschaft. Sobald das gemeine Volk ein Gesetzesschreiben in Frage stellt, ist Anarchie nie weit entfernt. Und deshalb muss die Aufrechterhaltung der Gesetze stets allen anderen Interessen voran stehen. - Maer de Vain, Bekenner der Weisung
TEXT.Italian: Laws, and their effective enforcement, are the foundation of any ordered society. Whenever common citizens start to question the letter of the law, anarchy is never far behind, and, therefore, upholding the law must come before all other concerns.-Maer de Vain, Confessor of the Order
TEXT.Spanish: Laws, and their effective enforcement, are the foundation of any ordered society. Whenever common citizens start to question the letter of the law, anarchy is never far behind, and, therefore, upholding the law must come before all other concerns.-Maer de Vain, Confessor of the Order

TEXT.French: Communion avec la Nature
TEXT.German: Schöpfung
TEXT.Italian: Commune with Nature
TEXT.Spanish: Commune with Nature

TEXT.English: In the wilderness, everything wishes either to kill you, or to let something else do it and then consume your remains. Nature has no concept of laws or mercy; in order to live, you must play by its rules.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Grakahl Redan, Hunter[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Dans les régions sauvages, toute chose veut vous tuer, ou permettre à quelque chose d'autre de le faire et consommer ensuite votre dépouille. La Nature n'a aucun concept de lois ou de clémence; pour survivre, vous devez jouer selon ses règles.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Grakahl Redan, Chasseur[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: In der Wildnis hegt alles den Wunsch dich zu töten, oder dich töten zu lassen, um dann deine Überreste zu konsumieren. Die Natur verfügt über kein Konzept von Recht oder Gnade; um zu überleben, musst du dich ihren Regeln anpassen. - Grakahl Redan, Jäger
TEXT.Italian: In the wilderness, everything wishes either to kill you, or to let something else do it and then consume your remains. Nature has no concept of laws or mercy; in order to live, you must play by its rules.-Grakahl Redan, Hunter
TEXT.Spanish: In the wilderness, everything wishes either to kill you, or to let something else do it and then consume your remains. Nature has no concept of laws or mercy; in order to live, you must play by its rules.-Grakahl Redan, Hunter

TEXT.English: Your walls do not protect you from the world. The illusion of safety it gives is far more dangerous than the fear of death. Stones will not slow the Riders of Nox Noctis.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Phadean, Shadow Rider[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Vos murs ne vous protègent pas du monde. L'illusion de sécurité qu'ils procurent est bien plus dangereuse que la peur de la mort. Les pierres ne ralentiront pas les Cavaliers de Nox Noctis.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Phadean, Chevaucheur d'Ombre[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Eure Mauern werden euch nicht vor der Welt beschützen. Die Illusion der Sicherheit die sie euch geben ist gefährlicher als eure Angst vor dem Tod. Denn Steine werden die Reiter der Nacht der Nächte nicht aufhalten. - Phadean, Schattenreiter
TEXT.Italian: Your walls do not protect you from the world. The illusion of safety it gives is far more dangerous than the fear of death. Stones will not slow the Riders of Nox Noctis.-Phadean, Shadow Rider
TEXT.Spanish: Your walls do not protect you from the world. The illusion of safety it gives is far more dangerous than the fear of death. Stones will not slow the Riders of Nox Noctis.-Phadean, Shadow Rider

TEXT.English: Corruption of Spirit
TEXT.French: Corruption de l'Esprit
TEXT.German: Gedankenkontrolle
TEXT.Italian: Corruption of Spirit
TEXT.Spanish: Corruption of Spirit

TEXT.English: True power is always costly. However, I think I can safely say that the rewards far outweigh any of the possible costs. Who cares for sanity, when you can burn the people claiming you to be insane to cinders with a thought? Who cares for purity, when this taint is so much more vitalizing? Who cares about the soul, when the mind can break all boundaries without it?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Tebryn Arbandi[\BOLD]
TEXT.French: Le vrai pouvoir est toujours coûteux. Pourtant, je crois que je peux dire sans me tromper que la récompense l'emporte largement sur n'importe quel prix. Qui se préoccupe de santé mentale, quand d'une pensée vous pouvez réduire en cendres ceux qui vous déclare fou ? Qui se préoccupe de sa pureté, quand la souillure est bien plus vivifiante ? Qui se soucie de son âme, quand l'esprit peut outrepasser toutes les limites sans elle ?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Arean Sethrail, Mage Ancestrale[\BOLD]
TEXT.German: Wahre Macht hat stets einen hohen Preis. Dennoch glaube ich sicher behaupten zu können, dass ihre Vorzüge alle möglichen Nachteile überwiegen. Wenn kümmert die Vernunft, wenn du die Leute, die behaupten du seiest verrückt, mit einer Handbewegung zu Asche verbrennen lassen kannst? Wen kümmert Reinheit, wenn der Makel so viel belebender ist? Wen kümmert die Seele, wenn der Geist ohne sie doch alle Grenzen sprengen kann? - Arean Sethrail, Altehrwürdiger Magier
TEXT.Italian: True power is always costly. However, I think I can safely say that the rewards far outweigh any of the possible costs. Who cares for sanity, when you can burn the people claiming you to be insane to cinders with a thought? Who cares for purity, when this taint is so much more vitalizing? Who cares about the soul, when the mind can break all boundaries without it?-Tebryn Arbandi
TEXT.Spanish: True power is always costly. However, I think I can safely say that the rewards far outweigh any of the possible costs. Who cares for sanity, when you can burn the people claiming you to be insane to cinders with a thought? Who cares for purity, when this taint is so much more vitalizing? Who cares about the soul, when the mind can break all boundaries without it?-Tebryn Arbandi

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When you have Ashen Veil as the state religion, the ritual [LINK=PROJECT_PAX_DIABOLIS]Pax Diabolis[\LINK] will become available in your cities.[NEWLINE]Completion of the Pax Diabolis ritual allows any unit in the city to [LINK=SPELL_PAX_DIABOLIS]fulfil the terms[\LINK] of the pact, sacrificing all citizens in the city and reducing it to ruins. Once this is done, Agares will be satisfied and your civilization will not be targetted further by the Demonic Barbarians.

TEXT.English: Crafting
TEXT.French: Artisanat
TEXT.German: Handwerk
TEXT.Italian: Crafting
TEXT.Spanish: Crafting

TEXT.English: First, you take a rock. Then you take another rock, and chip the unnecessary bits off the first one. What do you have now? A better rock. With this better rock, you can make something even more useful, and so on. That, my son, is the fundamental premise of tool-making.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gracken Smokebeard, Master Toolsmith
TEXT.French: D'abord, tu prends une pierre. Ensuite tu prends une autre pierre et avec tu ôtes les morceaux inutiles de la première. Qu'as-tu maintenant ? Une meilleure pierre. Avec cette meilleure pierre, tu peux fabriquer quelque chose d'encore plus utile, et ainsi de suite. Ceci, mon fils, est la base fondamentale de la fabrication d'outils.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gracken Barbefumée, Maître Outilleur
TEXT.German: Zuerst nimmst du einen Stein. Dann nimmst du noch einen Stein und spaltest die unnötigen Teile des ersten ab. Was hast du nun? Einen besseren Stein. Mit diesem besseren Stein kannst nun etwas noch nützlicheres herstellen, und so weiter. Dies, mein Sohn, ist die fundamentale Voraussetzung der Werkzeugherstellung. - Gracken Rauchbart, Meister des Werkzeugschmiedens
TEXT.Italian: First, you take a rock. Then you take another rock, and chip the unnecessary bits off the first one. What do you have now? A better rock. With this better rock, you can make something even more useful, and so on. That, my son, is the fundamental premise of tool-making.-Gracken Smokebeard, Master Toolsmith
TEXT.Spanish: First, you take a rock. Then you take another rock, and chip the unnecessary bits off the first one. What do you have now? A better rock. With this better rock, you can make something even more useful, and so on. That, my son, is the fundamental premise of tool-making.-Gracken Smokebeard, Master Toolsmith

TEXT.English: Consider this: The value of the coins I hold just now is completely illusory. They only have value because the majority of citizens in our society recognize them as effective bargaining material, but the moment a disaster strikes-drought, war, revolution, flood or famine-our money will be worthless, as it has no practical value in the following struggle for survival.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Dengrahl Lern, Stewards of Inequity
TEXT.French: Consider this: The value of the coins I hold just now is completely illusory. They only have value because the majority of citizens in our society recognize them as effective bargaining material, but the moment a disaster strikes-drought, war, revolution, flood or famine-our money will be worthless, as it has no practical value in the following struggle for survival.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Dengrahl Lern, Stewards of Inequity
TEXT.German: Bedenke dies: Der Wert der Münzen die ich in diesem Moment in meinen Händen halte, ist komplett illusionär. Sie sind nur deshalb von Wert, weil die Mehrheit der Mitglieder unserer Gesellschaft sie als effektives Material zum Handeln befindet. Aber in dem Augenblick, wo uns eine Katastrophe trifft, ob Dürre, Krieg, Revolution, Überschwemmung oder eine Hungersnot, wird unser Geld wertlos sein, da es keinen praktischen Nutzen im folgenden Kampf ums Überleben haben wird. - Dengrahl Lern, Kaufmann
TEXT.Italian: Consider this: The value of the coins I hold just now is completely illusory. They only have value because the majority of citizens in our society recognize them as effective bargaining material, but the moment a disaster strikes-drought, war, revolution, flood or famine-our money will be worthless, as it has no practical value in the following struggle for survival.-Dengrahl Lern, Stewards of Inequity
TEXT.Spanish: Consider this: The value of the coins I hold just now is completely illusory. They only have value because the majority of citizens in our society recognize them as effective bargaining material, but the moment a disaster strikes-drought, war, revolution, flood or famine-our money will be worthless, as it has no practical value in the following struggle for survival.-Dengrahl Lern, Stewards of Inequity

TEXT.German: List
TEXT.Italian: Deception
TEXT.Spanish: Deception

TEXT.English: The second most dangerous enemy is the one whose power and influence is vastly superior to yours. The most dangerous enemy is the one whose existence you are not aware of.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Arian Kothrax, High Councillor
TEXT.French: Le deuxième ennemi le plus dangereux est celui dont le pouvoir et l'influence sont considérablement supérieurs aux vôtres. Mais l'ennemi le plus dangereux est celui dont vous n'êtes pas conscient de l'existence.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Arian Kothrax, Haut Conseiller
TEXT.German: Der zweitgefährlichste Feind ist der, dessen Macht und Einfluss die deinen über alle Maßen übertreffen. Doch der gefährlichste Feind ist der, von dessen Existenz du gar nichts weisst. - Arian Kothrax, Mitglied des Hohen Rates
TEXT.Italian: The second most dangerous enemy is the one whose power and influence is vastly superior to yours. The most dangerous enemy is the one whose existence you are not aware of.-Arian Kothrax, High Councillor
TEXT.Spanish: The second most dangerous enemy is the one whose power and influence is vastly superior to yours. The most dangerous enemy is the one whose existence you are not aware of.-Arian Kothrax, High Councillor

TEXT.French: Divination
TEXT.German: Lehre der Weissagung
TEXT.Italian: Divination
TEXT.Spanish: Divination

TEXT.English: Complete knowledge of the future would be the greatest curse imaginable, but the occasional glimpse can often prove quite beneficial.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Kirin Mistfall, Mystic
TEXT.French: La connaissance complète de l'avenir serait la pire malédiction imaginable, mais une vision fugitive et occasionnelle peut souvent s'avérer vraiment favorable.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Kirin Mistfall, Mystique
TEXT.German: Alles über die Zukunft zu wissen wäre der größte Fluch, den man sich vorstellen kann. Aber ein gelegentlicher, flüchtiger Blick erweist sich oft als dienlich. - Kirin Mistfall, Mystikerin
TEXT.Italian: Complete knowledge of the future would be the greatest curse imaginable, but the occasional glimpse can often prove quite beneficial.-Kirin Mistfall, Mystic
TEXT.Spanish: Complete knowledge of the future would be the greatest curse imaginable, but the occasional glimpse can often prove quite beneficial.-Kirin Mistfall, Mystic

TEXT.English: Divine Essence
TEXT.French: Essence Divine
TEXT.German: Göttliche Essenz
TEXT.Italian: Divine Essence
TEXT.Spanish: Divine Essence

TEXT.English: Every object retains a part of its creator's influence. Are we to expect that there is no part of the gods in us?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Cellion Jarl, spoken just before leaping off the Tower of Prisms
TEXT.French: Chaque objet retient une part de l'influence de ses créateurs. Devons-nous nous attendre à ce qu'il n'y ait aucune part des dieux en nous ?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Cellion Jarl, juste avant de pénétrer dans la Tour des Prismes
TEXT.German: Sobald Jemand etwas kreiert, fließt ein Teil seines Wesens auf das Erschaffene über. Also warum sollten wir glauben, dass Nichts mit göttlichem Ursprung uns inne wohnt? - Cellion Jarl, gesprochen kurz bevor er vom Turm der Prismen sprang.
TEXT.Italian: Every object retains a part of its creator's influence. Are we to expect that there is no part of the gods in us?-Cellion Jarl, spoken just before leaping off the Tower of Prisms
TEXT.Spanish: Every object retains a part of its creator's influence. Are we to expect that there is no part of the gods in us?-Cellion Jarl, spoken just before leaping off the Tower of Prisms

TEXT.English: An uplifting song can make spirits soar and hearts sing in joy. A gloomy melody can make souls wither in pain, and minds shriek with horror. An insistent drumroll can still the restless nerves of marching soldiers, and lead them on towards victory and glory... You offered me a sword, but I think I will hold on to this harp of mine...[NEWLINE][BOLD]Aldorien Silvermoon, Elven Bard
TEXT.French: Un chant exaltant peut transcender les esprits et égayer les cœurs. Une mélodie lugubre peut torturer l'âme et faire hurler d'horreur les esprits. Un roulement de tambour insistant peut apaiser les nerfs agités des soldats en marche et les mener vers la victoire et la gloire... Vous m'avez offert une épée, mais je crois que je m'en tiendrai à ma harpe...[NEWLINE][BOLD]Aldorien Lunargent, Ménestrel elfique
TEXT.German: Ein Lied der Hoffnung kann deinen Geist beflügeln und dein Herz vor Freude tanzen lassen. Eine düstere Melodie lässt deine Seele vor Schmerz vergehen und kann deinen Verstand zu einem Schrei des Entsetzens treiben. Aber ein beständiger Trommelwirbel kann die angespannten Nerven der marschierenden Soldaten stählen, und sie zu Sieg und Ehre führen... Du hast mir ein Schwert angeboten, aber ich denke, dass ich lieber meine Harfe behalte... - Aldorien Silbermond, Elfenbarde
TEXT.Italian: An uplifting song can make spirits soar and hearts sing in joy. A gloomy melody can make souls wither in pain, and minds shriek with horror. An insistent drumroll can still the restless nerves of marching soldiers, and lead them on towards victory and glory... You offered me a sword, but I think I will hold on to this harp of mine...-Aldorien Silvermoon, Elven Bard
TEXT.Spanish: An uplifting song can make spirits soar and hearts sing in joy. A gloomy melody can make souls wither in pain, and minds shriek with horror. An insistent drumroll can still the restless nerves of marching soldiers, and lead them on towards victory and glory... You offered me a sword, but I think I will hold on to this harp of mine...-Aldorien Silvermoon, Elven Bard

TEXT.English: Education
The pursuit of knowledge is the noblest of Man's ambitions, but also the most dangerous. Some knowledge is best left alone.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Scholar
TEXT.French: La recherche du savoir est la plus noble des ambitions de l'Homme, mais aussi la plus dangereuse. Certaines connaissances valent mieux être évitées.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Érudit
TEXT.German: Das Streben nach Wissen ist das edelste Ziel des Menschen, aber auch das gefährlichste. So manche Erkenntnis sollte nie erlangt werden. - Jobin Seras, Gelehrter
TEXT.Italian: The pursuit of knowledge is the noblest of Man's ambitions, but also the most dangerous. Some knowledge is best left alone.-Jobin Seras, Scholar
TEXT.Spanish: The pursuit of knowledge is the noblest of Man's ambitions, but also the most dangerous. Some knowledge is best left alone.-Jobin Seras, Scholar

TEXT.German: Lehre der Elemente
TEXT.Italian: Elementalism
TEXT.Spanish: Elementalism

TEXT.English: Make a fire for a man, you warm him for a day. Make a fire of a man, you warm him for his lifetime[NEWLINE][BOLD]Taneath, Sheaim Poet
TEXT.French: Allumez un feu pour un homme et vous le réchaufferez pour une journée. Mettez un homme en feu, et vous le réchaufferez pour le reste de son existence.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Taneath, Poète Sheaïm
TEXT.German: "Entzünde ein Feuer für einen Menschen und du gibst ihm Wärme für einen Tag. Entzünde ein Feuer in einem Menschen und du gibst ihm Wärme für ein ganzes Leben." - Taneath, sheaïmischer Dichter
TEXT.Italian: Make a fire for a man, you warm him for a day. Make a fire of a man, you warm him for his lifetime-Taneath, Sheaim Poet
TEXT.Spanish: Make a fire for a man, you warm him for a day. Make a fire of a man, you warm him for his lifetime-Taneath, Sheaim Poet

TEXT.Italian: Exploration
TEXT.Spanish: Exploration

TEXT.English: Paradoxically, one of Mankind's first achievements was among its grandest. No other structure outlines the fundamental difference between Nature and Civilization so strongly than that of the wheel. Nature has yet to duplicate the simple, but sublime, circular object, which allows for so much conservation of energy.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Kleox Yarl, Royal Engineer
TEXT.French: Paradoxalement, une des premières réalisations de l'humanité fut une de ses plus grandes. Nulle autre structure ne démontre si fortement la différence fondamentale entre la Nature et la Civilisation que celle de la roue. La nature doit encore copier l'objet simple, mais sublime, circulaire, qui permet tant l'économie d'effort.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Kleox Yarl, Ingénieur Royal
TEXT.German: Paradoxerweise war eine der Menschheits ersten Errungenschaften auch ihre bedeutendste. Keine andere Konstruktion zieht eine so starke Grenze zwischen der Natur und der Zivilisation wie das Rad. Die Natur ist nach wie vor dazu verdammt, das Einfache zu kopieren, war so aber nicht in der Lage solch ein energiesparendes und so erhabenes und einfach rundes Objekt zu kreieren. - Kleox Yarl, Königlicher Ingenieur
TEXT.Italian: Paradoxically, one of Mankind's first achievements was among its grandest. No other structure outlines the fundamental difference between Nature and Civilization so strongly than that of the wheel. Nature has yet to duplicate the simple, but sublime, circular object, which allows for so much conservation of energy.-Kleox Yarl, Royal Engineer
TEXT.Spanish: Paradoxically, one of Mankind's first achievements was among its grandest. No other structure outlines the fundamental difference between Nature and Civilization so strongly than that of the wheel. Nature has yet to duplicate the simple, but sublime, circular object, which allows for so much conservation of energy.-Kleox Yarl, Royal Engineer

TEXT.English: Group together people deliberately chosen for strong religious feelings, and you have a practical guarantee of dark morbidities expressed in crime, perversion, and insanity.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Cassiel
TEXT.French: Rassemblez un groupe des gens délibérément choisis pour leurs forts sentiments religieux et vous obtiendrez un échantillon représentatif de caractères morbides exprimés dans le crime, la perversion et la folie.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Cassiel
TEXT.German: Fasse eine Gruppe von Leuten zusammen, die sich vorsätzlich für einen streng religiösen Weg entschieden haben und du hast praktisch eine Garantie für gesetzesbrecherische und finstere Morbiditäten, Perversionen und Geisteskrankheiten. - Cassiel
TEXT.Italian: Group together people deliberately chosen for strong religious feelings, and you have a practical guarantee of dark morbidities expressed in crime, perversion, and insanity.-Cassiel
TEXT.Spanish: Group together people deliberately chosen for strong religious feelings, and you have a practical guarantee of dark morbidities expressed in crime, perversion, and insanity.-Cassiel

TEXT.English: We have always been animals first and people second, so that no matter how eloquently our reason may speak, the final word is always had by our hunger, our rage, our lust.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Talia Gosam
TEXT.French: Nous avons toujours été des animaux avant d'être des hommes. Ainsi, quelle que soit l'éloquence de notre raison, ceux qui ont toujours le dernier mot sont notre faim, notre rage, notre désir.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Talia Gosam
TEXT.German: "Wir sind schon immer in erster Linie Tiere gewesen und erst in zweiter Menschen, so dass, egal wie zungenfertig wir unsere Gründe auch darlegen mögen, das letzte Wort immer von unserem Hunger, unserer Wut, unserer Gier gesprochen wird." - Talia Gosam
TEXT.Italian: We have always been animals first and people second, so that no matter how eloquently our reason may speak, the final word is always had by our hunger, our rage, our lust.-Talia Gosam
TEXT.Spanish: We have always been animals first and people second, so that no matter how eloquently our reason may speak, the final word is always had by our hunger, our rage, our lust.-Talia Gosam

TEXT.French: Festivals
TEXT.German: Festivitäten
TEXT.Italian: Festivals
TEXT.Spanish: Festivals

TEXT.English: Failures pave the path of learning, but even the least of failures made in battle will too often mean death. It is only logical that a way to ensure equal learning without as harsh a penalty should be devised amongst the brighter of military thinkers.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin of the Order
TEXT.French: Les échecs pavent le sentier d'apprentissage, mais le moindre échec dans la bataille conduit trop souvent à la mort. Il est donc logique qu'une façon de garantir un apprentissage équivalent sans une si dure contrepartie soient débattue parmi les plus brillants penseurs militaires.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin de l'Ordre
TEXT.German: Fehler pflastern den Pfad des Lernens, doch selbst der kleinste Fehler in einer Schlacht wird allzu oft den Tod bedeuten. So scheint es nur logisch, dass der Weg, der das Lernen sicher stellt, ohne dass eine derart harsche Strafe folgt, von jenen Militärstrategen ausgeklügelt sein sollte, die zu den Intelligenteren zählen. - Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin der Weisung
TEXT.Italian: Failures pave the path of learning, but even the least of failures made in battle will too often mean death. It is only logical that a way to ensure equal learning without as harsh a penalty should be devised amongst the brighter of military thinkers.-Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin of the Order
TEXT.Spanish: Failures pave the path of learning, but even the least of failures made in battle will too often mean death. It is only logical that a way to ensure equal learning without as harsh a penalty should be devised amongst the brighter of military thinkers.-Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin of the Order

TEXT.English: I'm telling you, this system is corrupt! Everyone extorts and humiliates the one below their ranks, and is in turn extorted and humiliated by the ones above them! The only one for whom such a system is just is the one on the top of the chain, and he is solely responsible for keeping us locked down like this! I ask you, is this fair? Is this justice?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Soren Castamer, Leader of the First Rebellion
TEXT.French: Je vous le dis, ce système est corrompu ! Chacun extorque et humilie celui au rang inférieur et il est à son tour extorqué et humilié par ceux au-dessus de lui ! Le seul pour qui un tel système est juste est celui en haut de la chaîne, sa seule responsabilité étant de préserver ce système ! Je vous le demande, est-ce équitable ? Est-ce justice ?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Soren Castamer, Chef de la Première Rébellion
TEXT.German: Ich sage euch, dieses System ist korrupt! Jeder erpresst und erniedrigt seine Untergebenen und wird dafür wiederum von seinen Vorgesetzten erpresst und erniedrigt! Der einzige, dem solch ein System zu gute kommt, ist der an der Spitze der Befehlskette stehende und er allein ist für unser aller Unterdrückung verantwortlich! Ich frage euch, ist das gerecht?! Ist dass Gerechtigkeit?! - Soren Castamer, Anführer der Ersten Rebellion
TEXT.Italian: I'm telling you, this system is corrupt! Everyone extorts and humiliates the one below their ranks, and is in turn extorted and humiliated by the ones above them! The only one for whom such a system is just is the one on the top of the chain, and he is solely responsible for keeping us locked down like this! I ask you, is this fair? Is this justice?-Soren Castamer, Leader of the First Rebellion
TEXT.Spanish: I'm telling you, this system is corrupt! Everyone extorts and humiliates the one below their ranks, and is in turn extorted and humiliated by the ones above them! The only one for whom such a system is just is the one on the top of the chain, and he is solely responsible for keeping us locked down like this! I ask you, is this fair? Is this justice?-Soren Castamer, Leader of the First Rebellion

TEXT.English: I have seen the world under your hand and it contained more sadness and pain than this age. Are you prepared to return to another age of your failures?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Mulcarn to Kylorin at Letum Frigus
TEXT.French: I have seen the world under your hand and it contained more sadness and pain than this age. Are you prepared to return to another age of your failures?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Mulcarn to Kylorin at Letum Frigus
TEXT.German: Ich habe die Welt gesehen, als sie unter eurer Herrschaft war, und sie enthielt mehr Traurigkeit und Schmerz als in diesem Zeitalter. Seid ihr darauf vorbereitet, zu einem weiteren Zeitalter voll von euren Fehlern zurückzukehren? -- Mulcarn zu Kylorin in Letum Frigus
TEXT.Italian: I have seen the world under your hand and it contained more sadness and pain than this age. Are you prepared to return to another age of your failures?-Mulcarn to Kylorin at Letum Frigus
TEXT.Spanish: I have seen the world under your hand and it contained more sadness and pain than this age. Are you prepared to return to another age of your failures?-Mulcarn to Kylorin at Letum Frigus

TEXT.English: Illegal? Why, technically I suppose it is. Immoral? No, I do not believe so. We are merely the extension of the conventional trading system, making sure the money keeps flowing through society, instead of being holed up in the treasury of some greedy lord, where it will not benefit anyone.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Fenfahr the Rat, Prince of Thieves.
TEXT.French: Illégal ? Techniquement, je le conçois. Immoral ? Non, je ne le crois pas. Nous sommes simplement l'extension du système commercial conventionnel, en nous assurant que l'argent continue à circuler dans la société, au lieu d'être terré dans la trésorerie d'un seigneur cupide, où il ne profitera à personne.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Fenfahr le Rat, Prince de Voleurs.
TEXT.German: Illegal? Nun, formal gesehen wahrscheinlich schon. Unmoralisch? Nein, das glaube ich nicht. Wir sind lediglich die Erweiterung des konventionellen Handelssystem und stellen sicher, dass das Geld weiterhin durch die Reihen der Gesellschaft fließ, anstatt von irgendeinem gierigen Fürsten in einer Schatzkammer geschachert zu werden, wo es niemandem etwas nützt. - Fenfahr die Ratte, König der Diebe
TEXT.Italian: Illegal? Why, technically I suppose it is. Immoral? No, I do not believe so. We are merely the extension of the conventional trading system, making sure the money keeps flowing through society, instead of being holed up in the treasury of some greedy lord, where it will not benefit anyone.-Fenfahr the Rat, Prince of Thieves.
TEXT.Spanish: Illegal? Why, technically I suppose it is. Immoral? No, I do not believe so. We are merely the extension of the conventional trading system, making sure the money keeps flowing through society, instead of being holed up in the treasury of some greedy lord, where it will not benefit anyone.-Fenfahr the Rat, Prince of Thieves.

TEXT.German: Verborgene Pfade
TEXT.Italian: Hidden Paths

TEXT.English: There's no sign of us here that our enemy sees[NEWLINE]Only whispering leaves in the shade of the trees[NEWLINE][BOLD]Excerpt from ancient elven poem.
TEXT.French: Il n'y a ici aucune trace que nos ennemis puissent voir[PARAGRAPH:1]Seulement le murmure des feuilles dans le noir[NEWLINE][BOLD]Extrait d'un ancien poème elfe.
TEXT.German: Hier gibt es kein Zeichen unserer Anwesenheit, welches der Feind sieht. [NEWLINE]Nur das Flüstern der Blätter im Schatten der Bäume. - Auszug aus einem alten, elfischen Gedicht
TEXT.Italian: There's no sign of us here that our enemy sees[NEWLINE]Only whispering leaves in the shade of the trees-Excerpt from ancient elven poem.
TEXT.Spanish: There's no sign of us here that our enemy sees[NEWLINE]Only whispering leaves in the shade of the trees-Excerpt from ancient elven poem.

TEXT.English: Honor
TEXT.French: Honneur
TEXT.German: Ehre
TEXT.Italian: Honor
TEXT.Spanish: Honor

TEXT.English: What separates us from them? Honor. We have it, they do not. And without it, even if they win, they will lose in the end. For a victory without honor is like a well without water-empty, and useless. Honor is the mortar that binds friends and the foundation upon which to build a future. Men who fight dishonorably are building their empire on sand.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Caradel Bluestride, Order Commander, speech before the last stand of the Divine Company.
TEXT.French: Qu'est-ce qui nous sépare d'eux ? L'honneur. Nous l'avons, pas eux. Et sans cela, même s'ils gagnent, ils finirons par perdre. Une victoire sans honneur est comme un puit sans eau - vide, et inutile. L'honneur est le mortier qui attache les amis et les fondations sur lesquelles construire un avenir. Les hommes qui luttent de manière déshonorante construisent leur empire sur le sable.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Caradel Bluestride, Commandant de l'Ordre, discours avant la dernière résistance de la Compagnie Divine.
TEXT.German: Was unterscheidet uns von ihnen? Ehre. Wir haben sie, sie nicht. Und ohne sie, selbst wenn unsere Feinde gewinnen, werden sie am Ende verlieren. Ein Sieg ohne Ehre ist wie eine Welle ohne Wasser, leer und nutzlos. Ehre ist der Mörtel, der Freundschaften zusammenhält und auf dem die Zukunft ihr Fundament findet. Männer, die unehrenhaft kämpfen, bauen ihr Reich auf Sand. - Caradel Blauschritt, Feldherr der Weisung, Rede vor dem letzten Gefecht der Göttlichen Kompanie
TEXT.Italian: What separates us from them? Honor. We have it, they do not. And without it, even if they win, they will lose in the end. For a victory without honor is like a well without water-empty, and useless. Honor is the mortar that binds friends and the foundation upon which to build a future. Men who fight dishonorably are building their empire on sand.-Caradel Bluestride, Order Commander, speech before the last stand of the Divine Company.
TEXT.Spanish: What separates us from them? Honor. We have it, they do not. And without it, even if they win, they will lose in the end. For a victory without honor is like a well without water-empty, and useless. Honor is the mortar that binds friends and the foundation upon which to build a future. Men who fight dishonorably are building their empire on sand.-Caradel Bluestride, Order Commander, speech before the last stand of the Divine Company.

TEXT.English: Horseback Riding

He imagines himself beyond the grasp of men, but we are faster than the storms. Though the tribes have ever been scattered we will be united by this betrayal and drown him in a symphony of stampeding hooves.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Rhoanna
TEXT.French: Il s'imagine être hors d'atteinte des hommes, mais nous sommes plus rapides que les tempêtes. Meme si les tribus ont toujours été dispersées, cette trahison nous unira et nous le noierons sous une déferlante de sabots rugissants.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Rhoanna
TEXT.German: Er meinte er wäre vor dem Zugriff der Menschen sicher, aber wir sind schneller als die Stürme. Obwohl die Stämme schon immer zerstreut und uneins waren, werden wir ihn durch diesen Verrat geeint, in einer Woge wild trampelnder Hufe ertrinken. - Rhoanna
TEXT.Italian: He imagines himself beyond the grasp of men, but we are faster than the storms. Though the tribes have ever been scattered we will be united by this betrayal and drown him in a symphony of stampeding hooves.-Rhoanna
TEXT.Spanish: He imagines himself beyond the grasp of men, but we are faster than the storms. Though the tribes have ever been scattered we will be united by this betrayal and drown him in a symphony of stampeding hooves.-Rhoanna

TEXT.English: Man is the most impressive of predators, for Nature saw fit to give him no advantages. He had to fashion his own fangs, carve his own claws. And now even the greatest of the beasts fear him.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Doras Kelt, Ranger
TEXT.French: L'homme est le plus impressionnant des prédateurs, pourtant la nature ne lui a accordé aucun avantage. Il a du former ses propres crocs, tailler ses propres griffes. Et maintenant même la plus puissante des bêtes le redoute.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Doras Kelt, Rôdeur
TEXT.German: Der Mensch ist das beeindruckenste aller Raubtiere, obwohl die Natur sich bemühte, ihm keinerlei Vorteile zu verschaffen. Er musste sich seine eigenen Reißzähne entwerfen, und sich seine eigenen Klauen schleifen und schnitzen. Und nun fürchten ihn selbst die größten Bestien. - Doras Kelt, Waldläufer
TEXT.Italian: Man is the most impressive of predators, for Nature saw fit to give him no advantages. He had to fashion his own fangs, carve his own claws. And now even the greatest of the beasts fear him.-Doras Kelt, Ranger
TEXT.Spanish: Man is the most impressive of predators, for Nature saw fit to give him no advantages. He had to fashion his own fangs, carve his own claws. And now even the greatest of the beasts fear him.-Doras Kelt, Ranger

TEXT.English: Infernal Pact
TEXT.French: Pacte Infernal
TEXT.German: Höllischer Pakt
TEXT.Italian: Infernal Pact
TEXT.Spanish: Infernal Pact

TEXT.English: I pledge my body, to gain your strength; I pledge my mind, to gain your insight; I pledge my heart, to gain your devotion; I pledge my soul, to gain your obedience.[NEWLINE][BOLD]The Grimoire of Summoning, Second Ritual
TEXT.French: J'offre mon corps en échange de votre force[NEWLINE]J'offre mon esprit en échange de votre perspicacité[NEWLINE]J'offre mon cœur en échange de votre dévotion[NEWLINE]J'offre mon âme en échange de votre obéissance.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Le Grimoire des Évocations, Second Rituel
TEXT.German: Ich verpfände meinen Körper, um deine Stärke zu erlangen; ich verpfände meinen Geist, um deine Weitsicht zu bekommen; ich verpfände mein Herz, um deine Hingabe zu besitzen; ich verkaufe meine Seele, um mir deinen Gehorsam zu sichern. - Das Zauberbuch der Herbeirufung, Zweites Ritual
TEXT.Italian: I pledge my body, to gain your strength; I pledge my mind, to gain your insight; I pledge my heart, to gain your devotion; I pledge my soul, to gain your obedience.-The Grimoire of Summoning, Second Ritual
TEXT.Spanish: I pledge my body, to gain your strength; I pledge my mind, to gain your insight; I pledge my heart, to gain your devotion; I pledge my soul, to gain your obedience.-The Grimoire of Summoning, Second Ritual

TEXT.English: Researching the Infernal Pact will allow a contract to be formed between the civilization that researched it and the [LINK=CIVILIZATION_INFERNAL]Infernal Civilization[\LINK], both will gain a beneficial trait from signing the pact and the Infernals will be summoned into the plane of Erebus to spread corruption and misery.
TEXT.French: Researching the Infernal Pact will allow a contract to be formed between the civilization that researched it and the [LINK=CIVILIZATION_INFERNAL]Infernal Civilization[\LINK], both will gain a beneficial trait from signing the pact and the Infernals will be summoned into the plane of Erebus to spread corruption and misery.

TEXT.Spanish: Researching the Infernal Pact will allow a contract to be formed between the civilization that researched it and the [LINK=CIVILIZATION_INFERNAL]Infernal Civilization[\LINK], both will gain a beneficial trait from signing the pact and the Infernals will be summoned into the plane of Erebus to spread corruption and misery.

TEXT.English: We cannot breed more than the orcs, or learn more than the Amurites. If we are to survive this age we must do so with muscle and iron[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lucian
TEXT.French: We cannot breed more than the orcs, or learn more than the Amurites. If we are to survive this age we must do so with muscle and iron.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lucian
TEXT.German: We cannot breed more than the orcs, or learn more than the Amurites. If we are to survive this age we must do so with muscle and iron.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lucian
TEXT.Italian: We cannot breed more than the orcs, or learn more than the Amurites. If we are to survive this age we must do so with muscle and iron.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lucian
TEXT.Spanish: We cannot breed more than the orcs, or learn more than the Amurites. If we are to survive this age we must do so with muscle and iron.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lucian

TEXT.English: Knowledge of the Ether
TEXT.French: Connaissance de l'Éther
TEXT.German: Kenntnis vom Äther
TEXT.Italian: Knowledge of the Ether
TEXT.Spanish: Knowledge of the Ether

TEXT.English: I'm telling you, this is the opportunity we've been seeking for decades! Soon, we will be able to escape the boundaries of the material world. Don't you see? There is power there, power beyond your dreams, and that power could be ours, if we were but willing to take the smallest of risks. Surely the council can approve of my proposition?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Arean Sethrail, Mage Elder
TEXT.French: Je vous le dis, c'est l'opportunité que vous avons recherché pendant des décennies ! Nous serons bientôt capables de nous affranchir du monde matériel. Ne le voyez-vous pas ? Le pouvoir est là, un pouvoir au-delà de vos rêves, et ce pouvoir pourrait être le nôtre, si seulement nous étions disposés à prendre des risques minimes. Le conseil peut bien valider ma proposition, non ?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Arean Sethrail, Doyen des Mages
TEXT.German: Ich sage euch, das ist die Gelegenheit, auf die wir all die Jahrzehnte lang gewartet haben! Bald werden wir in der Lage sein, den Grenzen dieser irdischen Welt zu entfliehen. Versteht ihr denn nicht? Dort gibt es Macht, Macht jenseits all eurer Träume! Und diese Macht könnte unser sein, wenn wir nur gewillt wären, ein winziges Risiko einzugehen. Der Rat kann solch eine Möglichkeit doch nicht unbeachtet lassen, oder? - Arean Sethrail, Ranghoher Magier
TEXT.Italian: I'm telling you, this is the opportunity we've been seeking for decades! Soon, we will be able to escape the boundaries of the material world. Don't you see? There is power there, power beyond your dreams, and that power could be ours, if we were but willing to take the smallest of risks. Surely the council can approve of my proposition?-Arean Sethrail, Mage Elder
TEXT.Spanish: I'm telling you, this is the opportunity we've been seeking for decades! Soon, we will be able to escape the boundaries of the material world. Don't you see? There is power there, power beyond your dreams, and that power could be ours, if we were but willing to take the smallest of risks. Surely the council can approve of my proposition?-Arean Sethrail, Mage Elder

TEXT.English: Machinery
TEXT.French: Mécanique
TEXT.German: Maschinenbau
TEXT.Italian: Machinery
TEXT.Spanish: Machinery

TEXT.English: Feel the current carrying our boat, and observe the wind filling our sails. Imagine if we were to harness their power, not merely for sailing, but for all manner of labor. The wind does not need food or payment, and water never gets tired or worn out. Ah, but this is folly... only a mage could do such, and what do they know about physical labor?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Reaghar Yor, Fisherman
TEXT.French: Sentez le courant portant notre bateau, et observez le vent gonflant nos voiles. Imaginez si nous pouvions exploiter leur force, pas uniquement pour la navigation, mais pour toutes sortes de travail. Le vent n'a pas besoin de nourriture ou de paiement, et l'eau n'est jamais fatiguée ou épuisée. Ah, mais c'est la folie... seul un mage pourrait réaliser cela, et que connaissent-ils au travail manuel ?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Reaghar Yor, Pêcheur
TEXT.German: Fühle, wie die Strömung unser Boot trägt und beobachte den Wind, wie er unsere Segel füllt. Stell dir vor, wie es wäre, wenn wir ihre Kraft nicht nur fürs Segeln, sondern für alle Arten der Arbeit nutzen würden. Der Wind braucht weder Essen noch Bezahlung und das Wasser ist niemals müde oder erschöpft. Ah, doch das ist töricht Allein ein Magier wäre zu so etwas fähig und was wissen die schon über körperliche Arbeit? - Reaghar Yor, Fischer
TEXT.Italian: Feel the current carrying our boat, and observe the wind filling our sails. Imagine if we were to harness their power, not merely for sailing, but for all manner of labor. The wind does not need food or payment, and water never gets tired or worn out. Ah, but this is folly... only a mage could do such, and what do they know about physical labor?-Reaghar Yor, Fisherman
TEXT.Spanish: Feel the current carrying our boat, and observe the wind filling our sails. Imagine if we were to harness their power, not merely for sailing, but for all manner of labor. The wind does not need food or payment, and water never gets tired or worn out. Ah, but this is folly... only a mage could do such, and what do they know about physical labor?-Reaghar Yor, Fisherman

TEXT.English: Malevolent Designs
TEXT.French: Desseins Malveillants
TEXT.German: Dämonenentwürfe
TEXT.Italian: Malevolent Designs
TEXT.Spanish: Malevolent Designs

TEXT.English: Cruelty is the prime virtue. Nothing else-not honor, not compassion, not purity of mind, not valor-will inspire an equal amount of respect in your underlings. Granted, it will be respect tinged with fear, but is there really any better kind?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gheroz Haan, Ashen Batliare
TEXT.French: La cruauté est la première des vertus. Rien d'autre - ni l'honneur, ni la compassion, ni la pureté de l'esprit, ni la valeur - n'inspirera autant de respect chez vos sujets. Certes ce sera un respect teinté de peur, mais y'a-t-il quelque chose de mieux ?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gheroz Haan, Batliare du Voile Cendreux
TEXT.German: Grausamkeit ist die mächtigste Tugend von allen. Nichts anderes, weder die Ehre, noch das Mitgefühl, weder die Reinheit des Geistes, noch der Heldenmut werden euren Untertanen einen derartigen Respekt vor euch einflößen. Zugegeben, es wird ein Respekt sein gefärbt in den Farben der Furcht sein. Aber gibt es wirklich etwas Wirksameres als die Furcht? - Gheroz Haan, Aschfahlener Batliar
TEXT.Italian: Cruelty is the prime virtue. Nothing else-not honor, not compassion, not purity of mind, not valor-will inspire an equal amount of respect in your underlings. Granted, it will be respect tinged with fear, but is there really any better kind?-Gheroz Haan, Ashen Batliare
TEXT.Spanish: Cruelty is the prime virtue. Nothing else-not honor, not compassion, not purity of mind, not valor-will inspire an equal amount of respect in your underlings. Granted, it will be respect tinged with fear, but is there really any better kind?-Gheroz Haan, Ashen Batliare

TEXT.English: Even the grandest of castles is basically just a large pile o' bricks stuck together.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Goglum, Jester
TEXT.French: Même le plus grand des châteaux n'est rien de plus qu'un grand tas de briques collées ensemble.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Goglum, Bouffon
TEXT.German: Selbst die größte Burg ist an sich nichts weiter als ein großer Haufen befestigter Steine. - Goglum, Hofnarr
TEXT.Italian: Even the grandest of castles is basically just a large pile o' bricks stuck together.-Goglum, Jester
TEXT.Spanish: Even the grandest of castles is basically just a large pile o' bricks stuck together.-Goglum, Jester

TEXT.English: As we seek to understand the world around us, the basic need for a system to order and categorize becomes evident. Our minds demand that we gaze openly at the world around us, looking right past its superficial qualities, to recognize the shapes and quantities everything consists of.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Hydal Mons, Theoretical Alchemist
TEXT.French: Tandis que nous cherchons à comprendre le monde qui nous entoure, le besoin élémentaire d'un système pour ordonner et catégoriser devient évident. Nos esprits demandent que nous observions ouvertement le monde alentour, en regardant juste qu-delà de ses qualités superficielles, afin reconnaître les formes et les quantités dont tout se compose.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Hydal Mons, Théoricien Alchimiste
TEXT.German: Da es uns danach dürstet, die Welt um uns herum zu verstehen, wird die grundsätzliche Notwenigkeit eines Systems, nach welchem wir ordnen und kategorisieren können, offensichtlich. Unser Verstand verlangt von uns, dass wir die Welt ums uns herum mit offenen Augen betrachten. Wir müssen durch ihre oberflächlichen Beschaffenheiten hindurch sehen, um die Formen und Quantitäten zu erkennen, aus welchen sich alles zusammensetzt. - Hydal Mons, Alchemist der Theorien
TEXT.Italian: As we seek to understand the world around us, the basic need for a system to order and categorize becomes evident. Our minds demand that we gaze openly at the world around us, looking right past its superficial qualities, to recognize the shapes and quantities everything consists of.-Hydal Mons, Theoretical Alchemist
TEXT.Spanish: As we seek to understand the world around us, the basic need for a system to order and categorize becomes evident. Our minds demand that we gaze openly at the world around us, looking right past its superficial qualities, to recognize the shapes and quantities everything consists of.-Hydal Mons, Theoretical Alchemist

TEXT.English: As Nature gives, so Nature takes away. But with a little skill and herblore, it is possible to use the gifts of Nature to prevent it from taking away, thus shifting the balance in our favor.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Renya Seen, Herbalist
TEXT.French: La Nature donne, et la Nature reprend. Mais avec un peu de compétence et en connaissant les simples, il est possible d'utiliser les cadeaux de la Nature pour l'empêcher de reprendre, penchant ainsi la balance en notre faveur.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Renya Seen, Herboriste
TEXT.German: So wie die Natur gibt, so nimmt sie auch. Aber durch ein wenig Geschick und Kräuterkunde ist es möglich, die Gaben der Natur gegen sie zu benutzen und das Nehmen zu verhindern. So verschieben wir die Balance zu unseren Gunsten. - Renya Sehen, Heilerin
TEXT.Italian: As Nature gives, so Nature takes away. But with a little skill and herblore, it is possible to use the gifts of Nature to prevent it from taking away, thus shifting the balance in our favor.-Renya Seen, Herbalist
TEXT.Spanish: As Nature gives, so Nature takes away. But with a little skill and herblore, it is possible to use the gifts of Nature to prevent it from taking away, thus shifting the balance in our favor.-Renya Seen, Herbalist

TEXT.English: Mercantilism
TEXT.French: Mercantilisme
TEXT.German: Merkantilismus
TEXT.Italian: Mercantilism
TEXT.Spanish: Mercantilism

TEXT.English: The protection of our national wealth demands that we restrict our trading, so as to prevent other nations from profiting from the work our faithful citizens have done. Any foreign power is a potential adversary, a vicious predator probing for weaknesses and biding its time. To hand it weapons and tools is to invite disaster.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Arian Kothrax, High Councillor
TEXT.French: La protection de notre richesse nationale requiert que nous restreignions notre commerce, afin d'empêcher d'autres nations de tirer profit du travail que nos fidèles citoyens ont réalisé. N'importe quel pouvoir étranger est un adversaire potentiel, un prédateur malfaisant sondant les faiblesses et attendant son heure. Lui donner armes et instruments c'est inviter le malheur.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Arian Kothrax, Haut Conseiller
TEXT.German: Zum Schutz des Wohlstands unseres Landes müssen wir den Handel einschränken, sodass keine andere Nation von der Arbeit unserer getreuen Bürger profitieren kann. Jede ausländische Macht ist eine potentielle Gefahr, ein bösartiges Raubtier auf der Suche nach Schwäche und bereit zum Sprung. Es auch noch anzuspornen und in diesem Bestreben zu fördern würde nur eins bedeuten: Ein Desaster. - Arian Kothrax, Mitglied des Hohen Rates
TEXT.Italian: The protection of our national wealth demands that we restrict our trading, so as to prevent other nations from profiting from the work our faithful citizens have done. Any foreign power is a potential adversary, a vicious predator probing for weaknesses and biding its time. To hand it weapons and tools is to invite disaster.-Arian Kothrax, High Councillor
TEXT.Spanish: The protection of our national wealth demands that we restrict our trading, so as to prevent other nations from profiting from the work our faithful citizens have done. Any foreign power is a potential adversary, a vicious predator probing for weaknesses and biding its time. To hand it weapons and tools is to invite disaster.-Arian Kothrax, High Councillor

TEXT.English: Message from the Deep
TEXT.French: Message des Abysses
TEXT.German: Ruf aus der Tiefe
TEXT.Italian: Message from the Deep
TEXT.Spanish: Message from the Deep

TEXT.English: I was adjusting the mainsail, getting ready to head home after a long day at sea, when suddenly I felt it. A terrible presence situated thousands of feet beneath us. I thought I was going mad, until I saw my expression mirrored on the faces of my crew. Something was down there, and had I known then what it was, I'd have headed for the shore and never sailed out again.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Reaghar Yor, Fisherman
TEXT.French: Je bordais la grand-voile, m'apprêtant à rentrer à la maison après un long jour en mer, quand subitement je l'ai senti. Une présence terrible située des milliers de pieds au-dessous de nous. J'ai cru que je devenais fou, jusqu'à ce que je voie mon expression reflétée sur les visages de mon équipage. Quelque chose était au fond, et aurais-je su ce que c'était, je me serais dirigé vers la côte et je n'aurais jamais plus navigué.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Reaghar Yor, Pêcheur
TEXT.German: Ich war gerade dabei das Hauptsegel zu richten, um dann nach einem langen Tag auf See endlich Heim kehren zu können, als ich es plötzlich spürte. Eine Furcht einflößende Präsenz, Tausende von Metern unter uns. Ich dachte, ich wäre verrückt geworden, bis ich sah, wie sich meine Empfindungen auf den Gesichtern meiner Mannschaft widerspiegelten. Etwas war dort unten und hätte ich damals gewusst, was es war, hätte ich nicht nur unverzüglich aufs Festland zu gesteuert, sondern ich wäre auch nieder zurückgekehrt. - Reaghar Yor, Fischer
TEXT.Italian: I was adjusting the mainsail, getting ready to head home after a long day at sea, when suddenly I felt it. A terrible presence situated thousands of feet beneath us. I thought I was going mad, until I saw my expression mirrored on the faces of my crew. Something was down there, and had I known then what it was, I'd have headed for the shore and never sailed out again.-Reaghar Yor, Fisherman
TEXT.Spanish: I was adjusting the mainsail, getting ready to head home after a long day at sea, when suddenly I felt it. A terrible presence situated thousands of feet beneath us. I thought I was going mad, until I saw my expression mirrored on the faces of my crew. Something was down there, and had I known then what it was, I'd have headed for the shore and never sailed out again.-Reaghar Yor, Fisherman

TEXT.French: La guerre est plaisante pour qui ne l'a jamais vécue.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Tethira, générale bannorienne
TEXT.German: "Zum Krieg fühlen sich nur jene hingezogen, die ihn nicht kennen." - Tethira, bannorischer General
TEXT.Italian: War is sweet to those who do not know it.-Tethira, Bannor General
TEXT.Spanish: War is sweet to those who do not know it.-Tethira, Bannor General

TEXT.French: Asservissement de l'Esprit
TEXT.German: Knechtung des Geistes
TEXT.Italian: Mind Stapling
TEXT.Spanish: Mind Stapling

TEXT.English: Freedom of religion, freedom of speech and freedom to protest one's government. All are meaningless without freedom of thought.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Sayrin Nures, Speaker of the Tide
TEXT.French: Freedom of religion, freedom of speech and freedom to protest one's government. All are meaningless without freedom of thought.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Sayrin Nures, Speaker of the Tide
TEXT.German: Freiheit der Religion, Freiheit der Rede und Freiheit zum Protest gegen die Regierung. Alle diese Freiheiten sind bedeutungslos ohne die Freiheit der Gedanken. - Sayrin Nures, Sprecherin der Gezeiten
TEXT.Italian: Freedom of religion, freedom of speech and freedom to protest one's government. All are meaningless without freedom of thought.-Sayrin Nures, Speaker of the Tide
TEXT.Spanish: Freedom of religion, freedom of speech and freedom to protest one's government. All are meaningless without freedom of thought.-Sayrin Nures, Speaker of the Tide

TEXT.English: The blessings of the earth are holy gifts from Kilmorph, and it is not only our privilege, but also our sacred duty, to seek these blessings, remove them from their rocky confines, and use them to improve our lives.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Osmand Rockspittle, Mining Supervisor
TEXT.French: Les bienfaits de la terre sont les cadeaux sacrés de Kilmorph, et ce n'est pas seulement notre chance, mais également notre devoir sacré que de chercher ces bienfaits, de les extraire de leurs prisons de pierre et de les utiliser pour améliorer nos vies.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Osmand Rockspittle, Contre-Maître Mineur
TEXT.German: Die Segen der Erde sind heilige Gaben von Kilmorph und es ist nicht nur unser Privileg, sondern auch unsere heilige Pflicht, nach jenen Gaben zu suchen, sie von ihrer steinernen Hülle zu befreien und sie zur Verbesserung unseres Lebens einzusetzen. - Osmand Steinspalter, Minenaufseher
TEXT.Italian: The blessings of the earth are holy gifts from Kilmorph, and it is not only our privilege, but also our sacred duty, to seek these blessings, remove them from their rocky confines, and use them to improve our lives.-Osmand Rockspittle, Mining Supervisor
TEXT.Spanish: The blessings of the earth are holy gifts from Kilmorph, and it is not only our privilege, but also our sacred duty, to seek these blessings, remove them from their rocky confines, and use them to improve our lives.-Osmand Rockspittle, Mining Supervisor

TEXT.English: Mithril Weapons
TEXT.French: Armes de Mithril
TEXT.German: Mithrilwaffen
TEXT.Italian: Mithril Weapons
TEXT.Spanish: Mithril Weapons

TEXT.English: It has been widely accepted as fact that the pen is mightier than the sword. With our new mithril blades, I think it just might be time to revise that statement.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Bambur, Dwarven Blacksmith
TEXT.French: Il est couramment admis que la plume est plus forte que l'épée. Avec nos nouvelles lames en mithril, je pense que le moment est venu de corriger ce proverbe.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Bambur, Forgeron Nain
TEXT.German: Es ist wurde weithin als Tatsache akzeptiert, dass die Feder mächtiger ist, als das Schwert. Mit unseren neuen Mithrilschwertern scheint es an der Zeit zu sein, diese Aussage zu revidieren. - Bambur, Zwergenschmied
TEXT.Italian: It has been widely accepted as fact that the pen is mightier than the sword. With our new mithril blades, I think it just might be time to revise that statement.-Bambur, Dwarven Blacksmith
TEXT.Spanish: It has been widely accepted as fact that the pen is mightier than the sword. With our new mithril blades, I think it just might be time to revise that statement.-Bambur, Dwarven Blacksmith

TEXT.English: Mithril Working
TEXT.French: Travail du Mithril
TEXT.German: Mithrilverarbeitung
TEXT.Italian: Mithril Working
TEXT.Spanish: Mithril Working

TEXT.English: I remember when we first stumbled upon it. At first I mistook it for silver, but then I let my lantern shine upon it. Never before had I seen such beauty, and I mouthed a silent prayer of thanks to Kilmorph. I stood there stunned for a moment, not daring to use my pick on this wondrous material. Then a sudden shaft of light illuminated the mine wall, coming from a hole in the ceiling. I then knew I had Kilmorph's blessing, and with infinite care I began to reap this mythical harvest.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Osmand Rockspittle, Mining Supervisor
TEXT.French: Je me souviens quand nous trébuchâmes dessus. Au début, je le confondis avec de l'argent, jusqu'à ce que ma lanterne luisit dessus. Jamais auparavant n'avait je n'eusses vu une telle beauté et j'articula une grâce silencieuse à Kilmorph. Je reste groguis un moment, n'osant pas à recours à mon pic sur cette merveilleuse matière. Soudainement, un puits de lumière éclaira le mur de la mine, venant d'un trou dans le plafond. Je sus alors que j'avais la bénédiction Kilmorph et avec un soin infini, je commença à moissonner cette récolte mythique.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Osmand Roche
TEXT.German: Ich erinnere mich noch, als wir zum ersten Mal darauf gestoßen waren. Zu erst glaubte ich, es sei Silber, doch dann berührte es der Schein meiner Laterne. Nie zuvor hatte ich so etwas Wundervolles erblickt und stumm ersann ich ein Gebet des Dankes an Kilmorph. Für einen Moment stand ich dort, erstarrt vor Ehrfurcht und wagte es nicht, meine Hacke an dieses erstaunliche Material anzulegen. Plötzlich drang von einem Loch in der Decke her eine Welle des Lichtes auf mich und die Mienenwände ein. Nun wusste ich, dass ich Kilmorphs Segen hatte. Und mit unendlicher Sorgfalt begann ich diese mystische Ernte einzubringen. - Osmand Steinspalter, Minenaufseher
TEXT.Italian: I remember when we first stumbled upon it. At first I mistook it for silver, but then I let my lantern shine upon it. Never before had I seen such beauty, and I mouthed a silent prayer of thanks to Kilmorph. I stood there stunned for a moment, not daring to use my pick on this wondrous material. Then a sudden shaft of light illuminated the mine wall, coming from a hole in the ceiling. I then knew I had Kilmorph's blessing, and with infinite care I began to reap this mythical harvest.-Osmand Rockspittle, Mining Supervisor
TEXT.Spanish: I remember when we first stumbled upon it. At first I mistook it for silver, but then I let my lantern shine upon it. Never before had I seen such beauty, and I mouthed a silent prayer of thanks to Kilmorph. I stood there stunned for a moment, not daring to use my pick on this wondrous material. Then a sudden shaft of light illuminated the mine wall, coming from a hole in the ceiling. I then knew I had Kilmorph's blessing, and with infinite care I began to reap this mythical harvest.-Osmand Rockspittle, Mining Supervisor

TEXT.English: Even in the distant past, before the Gods had revealed their divine presence to us, we still felt an unidentifiable longing, a yearning for some greater purpose, and some guidelines for our existence. Even then, a part of us must have known.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Scholar
TEXT.French: Même à l'aube de l'humanité, bien avant que les Dieux nous aient révélé leur divine présence, nous avions ce sentiment d'envie inidentifiable, le désir d'un but absolu, de directives pour notre existence. Même à ce moment, quelque chose en nous devait savoir.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Érudit
TEXT.German: Selbst in der fernen Vergangenheit, bevor die Götter uns ihre göttliche Präsenz enthüllt hatten, fühlten wir ein unerklärliches Verlangen, eine Sehnsucht nach einem größeren Ziel, und nach irgendeinem Leitfaden für unsere Existenz. Selbst damals muss es ein Teil von uns gewusst haben. - Jobin Seras, Gelehrter
TEXT.Italian: Even in the distant past, before the Gods had revealed their divine presence to us, we still felt an unidentifiable longing, a yearning for some greater purpose, and some guidelines for our existence. Even then, a part of us must have known.-Jobin Seras, Scholar
TEXT.Spanish: Even in the distant past, before the Gods had revealed their divine presence to us, we still felt an unidentifiable longing, a yearning for some greater purpose, and some guidelines for our existence. Even then, a part of us must have known.-Jobin Seras, Scholar

TEXT.English: The dead do not weep, but are wept for. Let us see who will weep for me.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lethe, queen of sorrows
TEXT.French: Les morts ne se lamentent pas ; ce sont les vivants qui se lamentent pour eux. Voyons ceux qui se lamenteront pour moi.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lethe, Reine des Pleurs
TEXT.German: The dead do not weep, but are wept for. Let us see who will weep for me.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lethe, queen of sorrows
