TEXT.English: This tech is not available for research. It is used to block any action that players cannot build or perform on their own such as objects that are only given in special situations.
TEXT.French: Cette technologie ne peut être recherchée. Elle sert à bloquer toute chose que les joueurs ne peuvent pas accomplir par eux-mêmes comme des objets qu'ils ne reçoivent que sous certaines conditions spéciales.
TEXT.German: Es gibt eine mögliche Rettung für euch. Ein Gott, der möglicherweise bereit ist, euch wieder in seiner Ära willkommen zu heißen. Seid ihr bereit, die Ideologie von drei Zeitaltern für die Chance einzutauschen, eure unsterbliche Seele behalten zu dürfen? Seid ihr gewillt zuzugeben, dass ihr lediglich existiert, den Göttern zu dienen? -- Auric Ulvin
TEXT.Italian: This tech is not available for research. It is used to block any action that players cannot build or perform on their own such as objects that are only given in special situations.
TEXT.Spanish: This tech is not available for research. It is used to block any action that players cannot build or perform on their own such as objects that are only given in special situations.

TEXT.English: There is a rescue waiting for you. A god who may be willing to accept you back in his ara. Will you trade the ideology of three ages for a chance to retain your immortal soul? Are you willing to admit that you exist only to serve the gods?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Auric Ulvin
TEXT.French: There is a rescue waiting for you. A god who may be willing to accept you back in his ara. Will you trade the ideology of three ages for a chance to retain your immortal soul? Are you willing to admit that you exist only to serve the gods?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Auric Ulvin
TEXT.German: Diese Tech kann nicht erforscht werden. Sie wird nur benutzt, um jegliche Aktionen des Spielers zu blockieren, welche er nicht selbst ausführen kann, wie zum Beispiel der Bau von Objekten, welche nur in bestimmten Situationen zur Verfügung stehen.
TEXT.Italian: There is a rescue waiting for you. A god who may be willing to accept you back in his ara. Will you trade the ideology of three ages for a chance to retain your immortal soul? Are you willing to admit that you exist only to serve the gods?-Auric Ulvin
TEXT.Spanish: There is a rescue waiting for you. A god who may be willing to accept you back in his ara. Will you trade the ideology of three ages for a chance to retain your immortal soul? Are you willing to admit that you exist only to serve the gods?-Auric Ulvin

TEXT.German: Allwissenheit
TEXT.Italian: Omniscience
TEXT.Spanish: Omniscience

TEXT.English: Do not tell me anything! Needing to know is a sign of weakness, and to reveal ignorance is to expose oneself. If I truly knew everything, I would have no weaknesses, and all would tremble before me.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Arean Sethrail, Mage Elder
TEXT.French: Ne me dîtes rien ! Chercher à savoir est un signe de faiblesse, et révéler mon ignorance m'expose. Si je connaissais réellement tout, je n'aurais aucun point faible, et tout le monde tremblerait devant moi.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Arean Sethrail, Mage Ancien
TEXT.German: Erzähle mir Nichts davon! Etwas wissen zu müssen ist ein Zeichen der Schwäche. Wer seine Ignoranz entblößt, entblößt sich selbst. Wenn ich wahrhaftig Alles wüsste, so wäre ich ganz ohne Schwäche und jede auf Erden wandelnde Kreatur würde vor mir erzittern. - Arean Sethrail, Alterwürdiger Magier
TEXT.Italian: Do not tell me anything! Needing to know is a sign of weakness, and to reveal ignorance is to expose oneself. If I truly knew everything, I would have no weaknesses, and all would tremble before me.-Arean Sethrail, Mage Elder
TEXT.Spanish: Do not tell me anything! Needing to know is a sign of weakness, and to reveal ignorance is to expose oneself. If I truly knew everything, I would have no weaknesses, and all would tremble before me.-Arean Sethrail, Mage Elder

TEXT.English: Vision is the most exquisite and refined of the senses. Lose it, and you are crippled for life. Enhance it, and you are brought one step closer to the gods.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Heron Jire, Sailor
TEXT.French: La vue est le plus exquis et le plus raffiné des sens. Perdez-le, et vous êtes handicapé pour le restant de votre vie. Améliorez-le, et vous faites un pas de plus vers les Dieux.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Heron Jire, Navigateur
TEXT.German: Die Sehkraft ist die exquisiteste und raffinierteste Sinneswahrnehmung, die wir besitzen. Verliere sie und du bist auf ewig verkrüppelt. Verbessere sie und du bist den Göttern ein Stück näher gerückt. - Heron Jire, Segler
TEXT.Italian: Vision is the most exquisite and refined of the senses. Lose it, and you are crippled for life. Enhance it, and you are brought one step closer to the gods.-Heron Jire, Sailor
TEXT.Spanish: Vision is the most exquisite and refined of the senses. Lose it, and you are crippled for life. Enhance it, and you are brought one step closer to the gods.-Heron Jire, Sailor

TEXT.English: Orders from Heaven
TEXT.French: Ordres des Cieux
TEXT.German: Weisung des Himmels
TEXT.Italian: Orders from Heaven
TEXT.Spanish: Orders from Heaven

TEXT.English: And the Lord did speak unto the warriors, and He did give commands, and He said: "I shall not suffer any to disobey these, my orders. But those who follow them, and heed their words, to those I can promise my protection and favor, they shall be my soldiers, and they shall have their reward at the end of time." Hearing this, the warriors fell to their knees and promised their swords and their lives to the Holy War, and they were born again, and none could stand in their way.[NEWLINE][BOLD]3rd Book of Junil, 1st Chapter, 5th Passage
TEXT.French: Et le Seigneur s'adressa aux guerriers, et Il donna commandements, et Il dit : "Je ne tolèrerai point désobéissance à mes ordres. Mais ceux qui s'y soumettent et prêtent attention à leurs mots, à ceux-là Je promets ma protection et mes faveurs, ils seront mes soldats et ils auront leur récompense à la fin de temps." Entendant ceci, les guerriers tombèrent à genoux et promirent épées et vies à la Guerre Sainte, alors ils renaquirent et personne ne pu se tenir sur leur chemin[NEWLINE][BOLD]3ème Livre de Junil, 1er Chapitre, 5ème Passage
TEXT.German: Und der Herr sprach zu den Kriegern und Er gab Befehle und Er sagte: "Ich werde keinen der euren dulden, die meine Gebote missachten. Aber diejenigen, die ihnen folgen und auf seine Worte Acht geben, denen kann ich meinen Schutz und meine Gnade zusichern. Sie sollen meine Soldaten sein und sie sollen ihren Lohn am Ende der Zeit bekommen." Als die Krieger dies hörten, fielen sie auf die Knie und versprachen ihre Schwerter und ihr Leben dem Heiligen Krieg und sie wurden wiedergeboren und Niemand vermochte es, sich ihnen in den Weg zu stellen. - Drittes Buch des Junil, 1. Kapitel, 5. Passage
TEXT.Italian: And the Lord did speak unto the warriors, and He did give commands, and He said: "I shall not suffer any to disobey these, my orders. But those who follow them, and heed their words, to those I can promise my protection and favor, they shall be my soldiers, and they shall have their reward at the end of time." Hearing this, the warriors fell to their knees and promised their swords and their lives to the Holy War, and they were born again, and none could stand in their way.- 3rd Book of Junil, 1st Chapter, 5th Passage
TEXT.Spanish: And the Lord did speak unto the warriors, and He did give commands, and He said: "I shall not suffer any to disobey these, my orders. But those who follow them, and heed their words, to those I can promise my protection and favor, they shall be my soldiers, and they shall have their reward at the end of time." Hearing this, the warriors fell to their knees and promised their swords and their lives to the Holy War, and they were born again, and none could stand in their way.- 3rd Book of Junil, 1st Chapter, 5th Passage

TEXT.English: Pass Through the Ether
TEXT.French: Traversée de l'Éther
TEXT.German: Passagen durch den Äther
TEXT.Italian: Pass Through the Ether
TEXT.Spanish: Pass Through the Ether

TEXT.English: The expanse was created to separate you from me, so that you would be forever limited by the weakness of your form and unable to barter the only thing the gods want from you: your soul.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Hastur
TEXT.French: L'étendue a été créée pour vous séparer de moi. Donc vous seriez pour toujours limités par la faiblesse de votre forme et incapable de troquer la seule chose que les Dieux veulent de vous, votre âme.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Hastur
TEXT.German: Die Weite der Welt wurde geschaffen, um dich von mir zu trennen. Damit du für immer ein Knecht deiner eigenen Schwächen sein würdest und niemals in der Lage wärst, das einzige zu verschachern, was die Götter von dir verlangen: Deine Seele. - Hastur
TEXT.Italian: The expanse was created to separate you from me, so that you would be forever limited by the weakness of your form and unable to barter the only thing the gods want from you: your soul.-Hastur
TEXT.Spanish: The expanse was created to separate you from me, so that you would be forever limited by the weakness of your form and unable to barter the only thing the gods want from you: your soul.-Hastur

TEXT.English: My study of philosophy has often been deemed frivolous. "Philosophy!" they will snort. "Each answer yields only more questions!" And yet a single answer and a dozen questions is better than none of either.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Scholar
TEXT.French: Mon étude de la philosophie a souvent été jugée frivole. "Philosophie !" grognaient-ils. "Chaque réponse produit seulement plus de questions !" Et encore, une réponse simple et une douzaine de questions sont mieux que rien du tout.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Erudit
TEXT.German: Mein Studium der Philosophie wurde oft als frivol erachtet. "Philosophie!" schnaufen sie. "Jede Antwort bringt nur neue Fragen!" Und dennoch ist eine einzelne Antwort und ein Dutzend Fragen besser, als keines von beidem. - Jobin Seras, Gelehrter
TEXT.Italian: My study of philosophy has often been deemed frivolous. "Philosophy!" they will snort. "Each answer yields only more questions!" And yet a single answer and a dozen questions is better than none of either.-Jobin Seras, Scholar
TEXT.Spanish: My study of philosophy has often been deemed frivolous. "Philosophy!" they will snort. "Each answer yields only more questions!" And yet a single answer and a dozen questions is better than none of either.-Jobin Seras, Scholar

TEXT.Italian: Poisons
TEXT.Spanish: Poisons

TEXT.English: A king may surround himself with loyal guards skilled in battle. He may live in a castle protected by 10 feet of fortified wall, and a moat for good measure. He may never travel outside without half his army accompanying him. He may sleep lightly, and keep hidden weapons under his pillow. He may have wired his castle doors and hallways with cunning and virtually undetectable booby traps. But if he neglects something as simple as employing a food taster, he is mine.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lahros Moonshade, Assassin.
TEXT.French: Un roi peut s'entourer de fidèles gardes talentueux en combat. Il peut vivre dans un château protégé par des murs fortifiés de 10 pieds, et de douves pour faire bonne mesure. Il peut ne jamais s'aventurer au dehors sans la moitié de son armée. Il peut dormir légèrement et garder des armes cachées sous son oreiller. Il peut avoir truffé ses portes de château et ses couloirs avec des pièges pratiquement indétectables. Mais s'il néglige quelque chose d'aussi simple qu'employer un goûteur, il est à moi.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lahros Moonshade, Assassin.
TEXT.German: Ein König mag sich mit loyalen, im Kampf geschulten Leibgarden umgeben. Er mag in einer Burg leben, geschützt durch 10 Meter befestigter Mauer und einen gut ausgebauten Burggraben. Er mag niemals auf Reisen gehen, ohne dass die Hälfte seiner Armee ihn begleitet. Er mag einen leichten Schlaf haben und Waffen unter seinem Kopfkissen verstecken. Er mag die Gänge und Türen seiner Burg mit Täuschungen und nahezu unaufspürbaren Sprengfallen bestückten. Aber sobald er etwas Simples wie einen Vorkoster vernachlässigt, wird er mein sein. - Lahros Mondschatten, Meuchelmörder
TEXT.Italian: A king may surround himself with loyal guards skilled in battle. He may live in a castle protected by 10 feet of fortified wall, and a moat for good measure. He may never travel outside without half his army accompanying him. He may sleep lightly, and keep hidden weapons under his pillow. He may have wired his castle doors and hallways with cunning and virtually undetectable booby traps. But if he neglects something as simple as employing a food taster, he is mine.-Lahros Moonshade, Assassin.

But if he neglects something as simple as employing a food taster, he is mine.-Lahros Moonshade, Assassin.

TEXT.German: Präzision
TEXT.Italian: Precision
TEXT.Spanish: Precision

TEXT.English: Children, I bid thee, fly to your friends;[NEWLINE]Swiftly and proudly, the dance never ends.[NEWLINE]One should meet up with the eye for a start,[NEWLINE]And one should be able to reach for the heart.[NEWLINE]One should greet the horse, by way of its neck,[NEWLINE]And one should hail the rider, first to his leg.[NEWLINE]One should carry a great gift to the throat,[NEWLINE]And one seek the page by the side of the road.[NEWLINE]One should be casting its glance at the jaw,[NEWLINE]And the last is set in the first head that it saw.[NEWLINE][BOLD]A Hail of Arrows, Old Elvish Nursery Rhyme
TEXT.French: Enfants, je vous l'offre, voler vers vos amis[PARAGRAPH:1]Rapidement et fièrement, la danse jamais ne finit[PARAGRAPH:1]D'abord un se porte à la rencontre de l'oeil[PARAGRAPH:1]Et un doit être capable d'atteindre le cœur[PARAGRAPH:1]Qu'un accueille le cheval, de par son cou[PARAGRAPH:1]Et l'un acclame le cavalier, d'abord à sa jambe[PARAGRAPH:1]Un portera grand cadeau à la gorge[PARAGRAPH:1]Et un cherche le page sur le bord de la route[PARAGRAPH:1]Un devrait porter son regard à la mâchoire[PARAGRAPH:1]Et le dernier mis dans la première tête qu'il vue[NEWLINE][BOLD]Une Grêle de Flèches, Vieille Comptine Elfique
TEXT.German: Fliegt zu euren Freunden Kinder, nehmt euch auch bei den Händen;[NEWLINE]schnell und stolz wird der Tanz nie enden;[NEWLINE]Den Zeitpunkt für den Anfang sowohl man kennt;[NEWLINE]Das man das Herz erreichen nennt;[NEWLINE]So wird er das Pferd beim Halse packen;[NEWLINE]Andere jubeln ihm zu und sitzen ihm im Nacken;[NEWLINE]Der Hals ist frei für ein bezauberndes Geschenk;[NEWLINE]In der kleinen Gasse fand sich aber nur was für das Handgelenk.[NEWLINE]Er lässt den blick heruntergleiten;[NEWLINE]Das er es sah, er war in Schwierigkeiten - Ein Hagel von Pfeilen, Alter elfischer Kinderreim
TEXT.Italian: Children, I bid thee, fly to your friends;[NEWLINE]Swiftly and proudly, the dance never ends.[NEWLINE]One should meet up with the eye for a start,[NEWLINE]And one should be able to reach for the heart.[NEWLINE]One should greet the horse, by way of its neck,[NEWLINE]And one should hail the rider, first to his leg.[NEWLINE]One should carry a great gift to the throat,[NEWLINE]And one seek the page by the side of the road.[NEWLINE]One should be casting its glance at the jaw,[NEWLINE]And the last is set in the first head that it saw.-A Hail of Arrows, Old Elvish Nursery Rhyme

TEXT.English: The gods, mighty and powerful as they may be, have always had a need for earthly assistants to facilitate and manage communications between the mundane and the divine. Perhaps it is too great a strain for even the gods to attend to all of their worshippers directly, or perhaps they regard it as fitting to let ordinary people speak to ordinary people, to further trust and understanding. Whatever their reasons, we are stuck with the priests, for all the good they do us...[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Scholar
TEXT.French: Les Dieux, forts et puissants comme ils peuvent l'être, avaient toujours un besoin pour les assistants terrestres, afin de faciliter et de diriger les communications entre le mortel et le divin. Peut-être est-ce un trop grand effort même pour les Dieux que de s'occuper directement de tous leurs fidèles, ou peut-être considèrent-ils plus adapté de permettre aux gens ordinaires de parler aux gens ordinaires, pour plus de confiance et de compréhension. Quels que soient leurs raisons, nous sommes coincés avec les prêtres, pour tout le bien qu'ils nous font...[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jobin Seras, Erudit
TEXT.German: Die Götter, so stark und allmächtig sie auch sein mögen, haben immer die Assistenz der Erdenbewohner benötigt, um die Kommunikation zwischen der irdischen und der göttlichen Welt zu bewerkstelligen und zu fördern. Möglicherweise ist es selbst für sie eine zu große Anstrengungen, sich den Wünschen und Problemen eines jeden Einzelnen ihrer Anhänger direkt zu widmen, oder sie befinden es vielleicht als angebracht, gewöhnliches Volk mit gewöhnlichen Volk sprechen zu lassen, um das Vertrauen und das Verstehen zu vertiefen. Was auch immer ihre Gründe sein mögen, uns bleibt nichts weiter, als die Predigten unserer Priester, so viel Gutes die Götter auch für uns tun... - Jobin Seras, Gelehrter
TEXT.Italian: The gods, mighty and powerful as they may be, have always had a need for earthly assistants to facilitate and manage communications between the mundane and the divine. Perhaps it is too great a strain for even the gods to attend to all of their worshippers directly, or perhaps they regard it as fitting to let ordinary people speak to ordinary people, to further trust and understanding. Whatever their reasons, we are stuck with the priests, for all the good they do us...-Jobin Seras, Scholar
TEXT.Spanish: The gods, mighty and powerful as they may be, have always had a need for earthly assistants to facilitate and manage communications between the mundane and the divine. TEXT.German: Raserei
TEXT.Italian: Rage
TEXT.Spanish: Rage

TEXT.English: When all the artificial layers of sophistication, moral codes, self-restraint, and pride are peeled off us, either by circumstance or through a conscious effort of will, we are naught but ferocious animals, no different from the other inhabitants of the great jungle of life.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Doras Kelt, Ranger
TEXT.French: Quand toutes les couches artificielles de la sophistication, les codes moraux, l'autodiscipline et la fierté se sont détachées de nous, par la circonstance ou par un effort conscient de volonté, nous ne sommes plus rien d'autres que des animaux féroces, identiques aux autres habitants de la grande jungle de vie.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Doras Kelt, Rôdeur
TEXT.German: Sobald all die künstlich erzeugten Eigenschaften der Kultiviertheit, des moralischen Anstandes, der Selbstbeherrschung und des Stolzes durch äußere Umstände oder durch den bewussten Einsatz unseres Willens von uns gewaschen wurden, sind wir nichts mehr als wilde Tiere. Dann gibt es zwischen uns und den anderen Bewohnern des großen Dschungels keinen Unterschied mehr. - Doras Kelt, Waldläufer
TEXT.Italian: When all the artificial layers of sophistication, moral codes, self-restraint, and pride are peeled off us, either by circumstance or through a conscious effort of will, we are naught but ferocious animals, no different from the other inhabitants of the great jungle of life.-Doras Kelt, Ranger
TEXT.Spanish: When all the artificial layers of sophistication, moral codes, self-restraint, and pride are peeled off us, either by circumstance or through a conscious effort of will, we are naught but ferocious animals, no different from the other inhabitants of the great jungle of life.-Doras Kelt, Ranger

TEXT.English: Religious Law
TEXT.French: Loi Religieuse
TEXT.German: Religiöse Ordnung
TEXT.Italian: Religious Law
TEXT.Spanish: Religious Law

TEXT.English: Look, this is very simple. We are inspired by the Holy Writ. We alone can read and interpret it. Therefore: Leave the thinking to us. You do what we say is right. If you do, there will be heavenly reward down the line. If you do not, the Divine One, in the form of me and my helpers here, will smite you. And it will not be pleasant.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lithelan Bruepol, Holy Arbiter
TEXT.French: Écoutez, c'est très simple. C'est à Nous que les Saintes Écritures ont insufflé la sagesse. Nous seuls sommes capables de les lire et de les interpréter correctement. Alors déléguez-Nous la tâche de la réflexion et contentez-vous d'agir en accord ave ce que Nous révélons être la bonne voie. Si vous obéissez, il y aura une récompense céleste au bout du compte. Si vous n'obéissez pas, le Créateur, par l'intermédiaire de Notre personne et de Nos assistants que voici, vous châtiera. Et ce sera très déplaisant.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Lithelan Bruepol, Saint-Arbitre
TEXT.German: Schau, das ist eigentlich ganz einfach. Die Heilige Schrift ist unsere Inspiration. Nur wir allein können sie lesen und interpretieren. Deshalb: Überlass uns das Denken. Du tust, was wir als richtig befinden. Wenn du gehorchst, werden dir die himmlischen Frohlockungen auf ewig sicher sein. Verweigerst du dich, wird der Göttliche, irdisch manifestiert durch mich und meine Gehilfen, dich strafen und peinigen. - Lithelan Bruepol, Heiliger Gebieter
TEXT.Italian: Look, this is very simple. We are inspired by the Holy Writ. We alone can read and interpret it. Therefore: Leave the thinking to us. You do what we say is right. If you do, there will be heavenly reward down the line. If you do not, the Divine One, in the form of me and my helpers here, will smite you. And it will not be pleasant.-Lithelan Bruepol, Holy Arbiter
TEXT.Spanish: Look, this is very simple. We are inspired by the Holy Writ. We alone can read and interpret it. Therefore: Leave the thinking to us. You do what we say is right. If you do, there will be heavenly reward down the line. If you do not, the Divine One, in the form of me and my helpers here, will smite you. And it will not be pleasant.-Lithelan Bruepol, Holy Arbiter

TEXT.English: Righteousness
TEXT.French: Vertu
TEXT.German: Rechtschaffenheit
TEXT.Italian: Righteousness
TEXT.Spanish: Righteousness

TEXT.English: The spirit of Nemed is within you, and its voice ever guides toward righteousness.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gloria Rendrahl, Diviner of the Order
TEXT.French: L'esprit de Nemed vous habite, et sa voix guide toujours vers la Vertu.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gloria Rendrahl, Devineresse de l'Ordre
TEXT.German: Der Geist Nemeds ist mit dir und seine Stimme wird dich immer zur Rechtschaffenheit anleiten. - Gloria Rendrahl, Erleuchtete der Weisung
TEXT.Italian: The spirit of Nemed is within you, and its voice ever guides toward righteousness.-Gloria Rendrahl, Diviner of the Order
TEXT.Spanish: The spirit of Nemed is within you, and its voice ever guides toward righteousness.-Gloria Rendrahl, Diviner of the Order

TEXT.English: The ocean-she's a dangerous wench. She will give you everything you need...your freedom, your food, your livelihood. But catch her on a bad day, and she will snatch it all back[NEWLINE][BOLD]Reaghar Yor, Fisherman
TEXT.French: La mer est une dangereuse gigolette. Elle vous donnera tout ce dont vous avez besoin... Votre liberté, vos aliments, vos moyens d'existence. Mais prenez-la un jour mauvais, et elle reprendra tout.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Reaghar Yor, le Pêcheur
TEXT.German: Der Ozean, ein wahrlich gefährliches Frauenzimmer. Er wird dir alles geben, was du brauchst deine Freiheit, deine Nahrung, deinen Lebensunterhalt. Aber erwische ihn an einem schlechten Tag und er wird es sich alles zurück rauben - Reaghar Yor, Fischer
TEXT.Italian: The ocean-she's a dangerous wench. She will give you everything you need...your freedom, your food, your livelihood. But catch her on a bad day, and she will snatch it all back-Reaghar Yor, Fisherman
TEXT.Spanish: The ocean-she's a dangerous wench. She will give you everything you need...your freedom, your food, your livelihood. But catch her on a bad day, and she will snatch it all back-Reaghar Yor, Fisherman

TEXT.English: Sanitation
TEXT.French: Hygiène
TEXT.German: Reinigung
TEXT.Italian: Sanitation
TEXT.Spanish: Sanitation

TEXT.English: According to the clergy, purity of spirit will shield you from all kinds of diseases and hardships. Personally, I believe purity of body might be a bit more crucial in this regard.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Renya Seen, Herbalist
TEXT.French: D'après le clergé, la pureté d'esprit vous protègera de toutes sortes de maladies et de difficultés. Personnellement, je crois que la pureté du corps est plus cruciale pour cela.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Renya Seen, Herboriste
TEXT.German: Der Klerus behauptet, dass die Reinheit des Glaubens dich von Krankheiten und Beschwerden aller Art schützen würde. Ich behaupte, dass hierfür die Reinheit des Körpers ein wenig mehr ausschlaggebend sein könnte. - Renya Sehen, Heilerin
TEXT.Italian: According to the clergy, purity of spirit will shield you from all kinds of diseases and hardships. Personally, I believe purity of body might be a bit more crucial in this regard.-Renya Seen, Herbalist
TEXT.Spanish: According to the clergy, purity of spirit will shield you from all kinds of diseases and hardships. Personally, I believe purity of body might be a bit more crucial in this regard.-Renya Seen, Herbalist

TEXT.French: Navigation
TEXT.German: Bootsbau

TEXT.Spanish: Seafaring

TEXT.English: This tech is only available to the Lanun civilization, and it is granted to them for free.
TEXT.French: Cette technologie n'est disponible que pour les civilisations ayant le trait Navigateur, et elle leur est donnée gratuitement.
TEXT.German: Wie langweilig ist das Land, wo du genau dort wieder aufwachst, wo du eingeschlafen bist. Übergebt mich den Strömungen der See, sodass ich, sollte ich jemals erwachen, dies in neuen Ländern tue. -- Falamar
TEXT.Italian: This tech is only available to the Lanun civilization, and it is granted to them for free.
TEXT.Spanish: This tech is only available to the Lanun civilization, and it is granted to them for free.

TEXT.English: How dull is land, that you should sleep and wake up in the same place. Give me the currents of the sea that I should ever awaken in new lands.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Falamar
TEXT.French: How dull is land, that you should sleep and wake up in the same place. Give me the currents of the sea that I should ever awaken in new lands.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Falamar
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie ist nur verfügbar für die Lanun und für sie Kostenlos
TEXT.Italian: How dull is land, that you should sleep and wake up in the same place. Give me the currents of the sea that I should ever awaken in new lands.-Falamar
TEXT.Spanish: How dull is land, that you should sleep and wake up in the same place. Give me the currents of the sea that I should ever awaken in new lands.-Falamar

TEXT.English: We are surrounded by her gifts, but they do not come easily. They were never intended for the hands of man, but the earth mother knows her dwarven children are much more patient.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Garrius Fy, Stonewarden
TEXT.French: Nous croulons sous ses cadeaux, mais ils ne s'acquièrent pas aisément. Ils n'ont jamais été destinés aux mains des hommes, mais la Terre Mère sait que ses enfants nains sont bien plus patients.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Garrius Fy, Gardien des Pierres
TEXT.German: Wir sind umgeben von ihren Gaben, doch sie lassen sich nicht so leicht entdecken. Sie sind für die Hände der Menschen nie bestimmt gewesen, aber Mutter Erde wusste, dass ihre Zwergenkinder weit aus geduldiger sind. - Garrius Fy, Edelsteinwächter
TEXT.Italian: We are surrounded by her gifts, but they do not come easily. They were never intended for the hands of man, but the earth mother knows her dwarven children are much more patient.-Garrius Fy, Stonewarden
TEXT.Spanish: We are surrounded by her gifts, but they do not come easily. They were never intended for the hands of man, but the earth mother knows her dwarven children are much more patient.-Garrius Fy, Stonewarden

TEXT.English: Sorcery
TEXT.French: Sorcellerie
TEXT.German: Zauberei
TEXT.Italian: Sorcery
TEXT.Spanish: Sorcery

TEXT.English: Despite the teaching of Ceridwen, the power of sorcery is available to any who would claim it. It isn't just the force of our oppression, but the tool of our liberation.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Kylorin, Archmage of the 7th Circle
TEXT.French: Malgré l'enseignement de Ceridwen, le pouvoir de sorcellerie est accessible à quiconque le réclame. Ce n'est pas seulement la force de notre oppression, mais aussi l'instrument de notre libération.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Kylorin, Archimage du 7ème Cercle
TEXT.German: Trotz der Lehre von Ceridwen ist die Macht der Zauberei für jeden zugänglich, der nach ihr verlangt. Sie ist nicht nur die Kraft unserer Unterdrückung, sondern auch das Werkzeug für unsere Befreiung. - Kylorin, Erzmagier des siebten Kreises
TEXT.Italian: Despite the teaching of Ceridwen, the power of sorcery is available to any who would claim it. It isn't just the force of our oppression, but the tool of our liberation.-Kylorin, Archmage of the 7th Circle
TEXT.Spanish: Despite the teaching of Ceridwen, the power of sorcery is available to any who would claim it. It isn't just the force of our oppression, but the tool of our liberation.-Kylorin, Archmage of the 7th Circle

TEXT.English: Stirrups
TEXT.French: Étriers
TEXT.German: Steigbügel
TEXT.Italian: Stirrups
TEXT.Spanish: Stirrups

TEXT.English: They had loops at the end of their saddles for their feet. For all their supposed horsemanship, the Hippus couldn't manage to hold the horse with their legs. I laughed when I saw the longbows their cavalry carried. They would be impossible to fire while mounted. Then they stood up in their stirrups and drew back their bows.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Percium, after the Slaughter of Nine Fields
TEXT.French: Ils avaient des boucles à l'extrémité de leurs selles pour leurs pieds. Malgré tout leur talent de monte présumé, les Hippus ne pouvaient réussir à tenir le cheval avec leurs jambes. J'ai ri quand j'ai vu les arcs longs que leurs cavaliers portaient. Ils ne pourraient pas tirer avec tout en restant montés. C'est là qu'ils se sont dressés sur leurs étriers et ont bandé leur arcs.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Percium, après le massacre des Neuf Champs
TEXT.German: An den Enden ihrer Sattel hatten sie runde Öffnungen für ihre Füße. Bei all ihrer berüchtigten Reitkunst vermochten es die Hippus nicht, die Pferde mit ihren Beinen zu halten. Ich lachte, als ich die Langbögen ihrer Kavallerie sah. Es würde für sie unmöglich sein zu schießen, während sie ritten. Dann erhoben sie sich aus den Steigbügeln and spannten ihre Bogensehnen. - Percium, nach der Schlacht der Neun Ebenen
TEXT.Italian: They had loops at the end of their saddles for their feet. For all their supposed horsemanship, the Hippus couldn't manage to hold the horse with their legs. I laughed when I saw the longbows their cavalry carried. They would be impossible to fire while mounted. Then they stood up in their stirrups and drew back their bows.-Percium, after the Slaughter of Nine Fields
TEXT.Spanish: They had loops at the end of their saddles for their feet. For all their supposed horsemanship, the Hippus couldn't manage to hold the horse with their legs. I laughed when I saw the longbows their cavalry carried. They would be impossible to fire while mounted. Then they stood up in their stirrups and drew back their bows.-Percium, after the Slaughter of Nine Fields

TEXT.English: Strength of Will
TEXT.French: Force de la Volonté
TEXT.German: Willenskraft
TEXT.Italian: Strength of Will
TEXT.Spanish: Strength of Will

TEXT.English: There are people who argue that, in order to truly be in control, you need to be able and willing to make the transition from thought to action. As you soon will learn, those ignorant fools have no idea what can be achieved with sufficiently focused thought.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gaelan Sedracious, Mage Elder
TEXT.French: Certains soutiennent que, pour assurer un véritable contrôle, vous devez être aptes et disposés à faire la transition entre la pensée et l'action. Comme vous l'apprendrez bientôt, ces imbéciles ignorants n'ont aucune idée ce qui peut être accompli avec une pensée suffisamment focalisée.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Gaelan Sedracious, Doyen de Magie
TEXT.German: Es gibt Leute, die behaupten, dass um wirklich Kontrolle zu haben, man in der Lage und gewillt sein muss, den Gedanken Taten folgen zu lassen. Wie du bald lernen wirst, haben diese ignoranten Idioten keine Ahnung, was mit einem genügend konzentrierten Gedanken erreicht werden kann. - Gaelan Sedracious, Großmagier
TEXT.Italian: There are people who argue that, in order to truly be in control, you need to be able and willing to make the transition from thought to action. As you soon will learn, those ignorant fools have no idea what can be achieved with sufficiently focused thought.-Gaelan Sedracious, Mage Elder
TEXT.Spanish: There are people who argue that, in order to truly be in control, you need to be able and willing to make the transition from thought to action. As you soon will learn, those ignorant fools have no idea what can be achieved with sufficiently focused thought.-Gaelan Sedracious, Mage Elder

TEXT.English: Swamp-dwelling
TEXT.French: Espèce Palustre
TEXT.German: Leben im Sumpf
TEXT.Italian: Swamp-dwelling
TEXT.Spanish: Swamp-dwelling

TEXT.English: This tech represents the natural affinity that Lizardmen have for swamplike terrain. It is provided freely to the Mazatl and Cualli civilizatons and cannot be researched. It grants bonuses to food production of the Swamp improvement and allows rapid travel on Trails.
TEXT.French: Cette technologie représente l'affinité naturelle des lézards pour les terres marécageuses. Elle est fournie d'office aux civilisations Mazatl et Cualli et ne peut être recherchée par les autres. Grâce à cette technologie, l'amélioration marais produit plus de nourriture, et les unités se déplacent plus vite sur de simples chemins.
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie steht für die natürliche Begabung, die Echsenmenschen für sumpfähnliches Gelände haben. Sie steht den Mazatl und den Cualli Zivilisationen frei und kann nicht erforscht werden. Sie liefert diesen Völkern Boni auf Nahrungsproduktion bei Sumpfbewirtschaftung und erlaubt schnellere Bewegung über Sumpfpfaden.
TEXT.Italian: This tech represents the natural affinity that Lizardmen have for swamplike terrain. It is provided freely to the Mazatl and Cualli civilizatons and cannot be researched. It grants bonuses to food production of the Swamp improvement and allows rapid travel on Trails.
TEXT.Spanish: This tech represents the natural affinity that Lizardmen have for swamplike terrain. It is provided freely to the Mazatl and Cualli civilizatons and cannot be researched. It grants bonuses to food production of the Swamp improvement and allows rapid travel on Trails.

TEXT.English: "Listen, lad. I built this kingdom up from nothing. When I started here, all there was was swamp. Other kings said I was daft to build a castle on a swamp, but I built it all the same, just to show 'em. It sank into the swamp. So, I built a second one. That sank into the swamp. So I built a third one. That burned down, fell over, then sank into the swamp. But the fourth one... stayed up! And that's what you're gonna get, lad: the strongest castle in these islands."[NEWLINE][BOLD]Prince Herbert's Father, The Holy Grail
TEXT.French: "Listen, lad. I built this kingdom up from nothing. When I started here, all there was was swamp. Other kings said I was daft to build a castle on a swamp, but I built it all the same, just to show 'em. It sank into the swamp. So, I built a second one. That sank into the swamp. So I built a third one. That burned down, fell over, then sank into the swamp. But the fourth one... stayed up! And that's what you're gonna get, lad: the strongest castle in these islands."[NEWLINE][BOLD]Prince Herbert's Father, The Holy Grail
TEXT.German: "Hör zu, mein Junge. Ich hab das alles aus dem Nichts aufgebaut. Als ich hier anfing, hatte ich nichts als Sumpf. Alle anderen Rancher, ähhh Könige, sagten, ich sei verrückt, hier zu bauen. Aber ich habe trotzdem hier gebaut. Das erste Schloss versank im Sumpf. Dann hab ich ein zweites gebaut. Das versank ebenfalls im Sumpf. Also baute ich ein drittes. Das brannte dann ab, weil Du gekokelt hast. Aber das vierte, das ich baute, das blieb stehen."[NEWLINE][BOLD]Prinz Herberts Vater, Ritter der Kokosnuss
TEXT.Italian: "Listen, lad. I built this kingdom up from nothing. When I started here, all there was was swamp. Other kings said I was daft to build a castle on a swamp, but I built it all the same, just to show 'em. It sank into the swamp. So, I built a second one. That sank into the swamp. So I built a third one. That burned down, fell over, then sank into the swamp. But the fourth one... stayed up! And that's what you're gonna get, lad: the strongest castle in these islands."[NEWLINE][BOLD]Prince Herbert's Father, The Holy Grail
TEXT.Spanish: "Listen, lad. I built this kingdom up from nothing. When I started here, all there was was swamp. Other kings said I was daft to build a castle on a swamp, but I built it all the same, just to show 'em. It sank into the swamp. So, I built a second one. That sank into the swamp. So I built a third one. That burned down, fell over, then sank into the swamp. But the fourth one... stayed up! And that's what you're gonna get, lad: the strongest castle in these islands."[NEWLINE][BOLD]Prince Herbert's Father, The Holy Grail

TEXT.Italian: Taxation
TEXT.Spanish: Taxation

TEXT.English: If there is a finite amount of a resource, then it cannot be equally allocated. As with water where there are oceans there will also be deserts. What better method do we have to see that gold is distributed unevenly than the hand of government and the concept of taxation?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Dengrahl Lern, Stewards of Inequity
TEXT.French: If there is a finite amount of a resource, then it cannot be equally allocated. As with water where there are oceans there will also be deserts. What better method do we have to see that gold is distributed unevenly than the hand of government and the concept of taxation?[NEWLINE][BOLD]Dengrahl Lern, Stewards of Inequity

TEXT.English: To Junil, we are but lowly servants, mere tools to further his divine plan. We owe him our allegiance, as we owe him our existence. Resisting Him would be akin to a hammer resisting the will of a blacksmith-not only is it impossible, but the very notion is absurd.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Ruvan Ghiz, Confessor
TEXT.French: Pour Junil, nous ne sommes que de modestes domestiques, des instruments pour parachever son plan divin. Nous lui devons notre fidélité, comme nous lui devons notre existence. S'opposer à Lui serait semblable à un marteau s'opposant à la volonté d'un forgeron - cela est non seulement cela impossible, mais la notion même est absurde.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Ruvan Ghiz, Confesseur
TEXT.German: Für Junil sind wir nur niedere Diener, schiere Werkzeuge ihres göttlichen Plans. Wir schulden ihm unsere Treue, so wie wir ihm unsere Existenz verdanken. Sich ihm zu widersetzten wäre, wie wenn sich ein Hammer dem Willen seines Schmiedes widersetzt - es ist nicht nur unmöglich, sondern der alleinige Gedanke auch völlig absurd. - Ruvan Ghiz, Bekenner der Weisung
TEXT.Italian: To Junil, we are but lowly servants, mere tools to further his divine plan. We owe him our allegiance, as we owe him our existence. Resisting Him would be akin to a hammer resisting the will of a blacksmith-not only is it impossible, but the very notion is absurd.- Ruvan Ghiz, Confessor
TEXT.Spanish: To Junil, we are but lowly servants, mere tools to further his divine plan. We owe him our allegiance, as we owe him our existence. Resisting Him would be akin to a hammer resisting the will of a blacksmith-not only is it impossible, but the very notion is absurd.- Ruvan Ghiz, Confessor

TEXT.English: Tracking
TEXT.French: Traque
TEXT.German: Fährtenlesen
TEXT.Italian: Tracking
TEXT.Spanish: Tracking

TEXT.English: Can I find him? Observe the broken twigs there, the flattened patch of grass over there, and the slight depression around the rock there. Listen to the changes in the birdcalls further ahead, and the squirrels scurrying about in the treetops. He might as well be trailing a bright red carpet.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Doras Kelt, Ranger
TEXT.French: Puis-je le trouver ? Observez les brindilles cassées ici, l'herbe aplatie par là, et la faible dépression autour de cette roche. Écoutez les changements dans les chants des oiseaux plus loin, et les écureuils courant précipitamment dans la cime des arbres. Il serait aussi simple de suivre un tapis rouge brillant.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Doras Kelt, Rôdeur
TEXT.German: Kann ich ihn finden? Bemerke die zerbrochenen Zweige dort, den plattgedrückten Flecken Gras dort drüben und die leichte Senke um den Stein dort. Höre auf die Veränderungen der Vogelschreie weiter vorn und die in den Baumspitzen herumhastenden Eichhörnchen. Er könnte genauso gut über einen leuchtend roten Teppich wandeln. - Doras Kelt, Waldläufer
TEXT.Italian: Can I find him? Observe the broken twigs there, the flattened patch of grass over there, and the slight depression around the rock there. Listen to the changes in the birdcalls further ahead, and the squirrels scurrying about in the treetops. He might as well be trailing a bright red carpet.--Doras Kelt, Ranger
TEXT.Spanish: Can I find him? Observe the broken twigs there, the flattened patch of grass over there, and the slight depression around the rock there. Listen to the changes in the birdcalls further ahead, and the squirrels scurrying about in the treetops. He might as well be trailing a bright red carpet.--Doras Kelt, Ranger

TEXT.English: A merchant does not *ride* a horse on the winds of fate; he *drives* a chariot to wherever he wishes!" [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Omar of Turin

TEXT.English: Warfare
TEXT.French: Militarisation
TEXT.German: Militärwesen
TEXT.Italian: Warfare
TEXT.Spanish: Warfare

TEXT.English: Our lands were forged through strife. The land was never given to us; we had to carve it out of Nature's grasp with our swords and axes. We are a minority of good men in an evil world, and so we must be ever watchful, ever vigilant, lest the more vicious people of the world should take our lands for theirs.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin of the Order
TEXT.French: Notre territoire a été façonné par les conflits. La terre ne nous a jamais été donnée ; nous avons dû l'arracher à la Nature avec nos épées et nos haches. Nous sommes une minorité de gens bons dans un monde mauvais et donc nous devons toujours être attentifs, toujours vigilants, de peur que les gens les plus malfaisants du monde ne s'accaparent nos terres.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin de l'Ordre
TEXT.German: Unsere Lande wurden durch Unfrieden geformt. Das Land wurde uns nicht einfach gegeben, wir mussten es dem Zugriff der Natur mit Schwertern und Äxten entreißen. Wir sind ein Häuflein guter Menschen in einer bösen Welt, also müssen wir immer wachsam und umsichtig sein, damit nicht ein heimtückisches Volk unser Land als seines erachtet. - Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin der Weisung
TEXT.Italian: Our lands were forged through strife. The land was never given to us; we had to carve it out of Nature's grasp with our swords and axes. We are a minority of good men in an evil world, and so we must be ever watchful, ever vigilant, lest the more vicious people of the world should take our lands for theirs.-Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin of the Order
TEXT.Spanish: Our lands were forged through strife. The land was never given to us; we had to carve it out of Nature's grasp with our swords and axes. We are a minority of good men in an evil world, and so we must be ever watchful, ever vigilant, lest the more vicious people of the world should take our lands for theirs.-Jasper Rendrahl, Paladin of the Order

TEXT.English: A good seat on a horse steals away your opponent's courage and your onlooker's heart-what reason is there to attack? Sit like one who has conquered.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Nietz the Bandit Lord
TEXT.French: A good seat on a horse steals away your opponent's courage and your onlooker's heart-what reason is there to attack? Sit like one who has conquered.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Nietz the Bandit Lord
TEXT.German: Die richtige Haltung auf deinem Roß nimmt deinem Feind den Mut und stiehlt den Zaungästen das Herz. Warum noch kämpfen? Reite wie jemand, der bereits gewonnen hat. - Nietzsche
TEXT.Italian: A good seat on a horse steals away your opponent's courage and your onlooker's heart-what reason is there to attack? Sit like one who has conquered.-Nietz the Bandit Lord

TEXT.English: Impia tortorum longos hic turba furores[NEWLINE]Sanguinis innocui, non satiata, aluit.[NEWLINE]Sospite nunc patria, franco nunc funeris antro,[NEWLINE]Mors ubi dira fuit vita salusque patent.[NEWLINE][BOLD]e.a.p.
TEXT.French: Impia tortorum longos hic turba furores[NEWLINE]Sanguinis innocui, non satiata, aluit.[NEWLINE]Sospite nunc patria, franco nunc funeris antro,[NEWLINE]Mors ubi dira fuit vita salusque patent.[NEWLINE][BOLD]e.a.p.
TEXT.German: Die gottlose, hungrige Menge, nährt hier ihre tollkühne Raserei[NEWLINE] von unschuldigem Blut. [NEWLINE]Halte durch, Vaterland, die Höhle des Todes ist eingestürzt. Wo einst der Tod grimmte, [NEWLINE] sind nun Leben und Erlösung greifbar. [NEWLINE] - e.a.p.
TEXT.Italian: Impia tortorum longos hic turba furores[NEWLINE]Sanguinis innocui, non satiata, aluit.[NEWLINE]Sospite nunc patria, franco nunc funeris antro,[NEWLINE]Mors ubi dira fuit vita salusque patent.[NEWLINE]-e.a.p.
TEXT.Spanish: Impia tortorum longos hic turba furores[NEWLINE]Sanguinis innocui, non satiata, aluit.[NEWLINE]Sospite nunc patria, franco nunc funeris antro,[NEWLINE]Mors ubi dira fuit vita salusque patent.[NEWLINE]-e.a.p.

TEXT.English: Way of the Wise
TEXT.French: Voie du Sage
TEXT.German: Weg der Weisen
TEXT.Italian: Way of the Wise
TEXT.Spanish: Way of the Wise

TEXT.English: What value is land gained by fire? What empire can be built on burnt fields and ruined forests? Demonic pacts are equally short-sighted. The only true strength is in creation and order.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Agadean, Order Acolyte
TEXT.French: Quelle est la valeur d'un terrain incendié ? Quel empire peut être construit sur des champs brûlés et des forêts ruinées ? Les pactes diaboliques sont tout aussi myopes. La seule vraie force est dans la création et l'ordre.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Agadean, Acolyte de l'Ordre
TEXT.German: Welchen Wert hat durch Feuer gewonnenes Land? Welches Reich kann auf verbrannten Feldern und abgeholzten Wäldern errichtet werden? Dämonische Bündnisse sind beiderseits kurzsichtig. Die einzig wahre Stärke liegt in Schöpfung und Ordnung. - Agadean, Akolyt der Weisung
TEXT.Italian: What value is land gained by fire? What empire can be built on burnt fields and ruined forests? Demonic pacts are equally short-sighted. The only true strength is in creation and order.-Agadean, Order Acolyte
TEXT.Spanish: What value is land gained by fire? What empire can be built on burnt fields and ruined forests? Demonic pacts are equally short-sighted. The only true strength is in creation and order.-Agadean, Order Acolyte

TEXT.English: White Hand
TEXT.French: Main Blanche
TEXT.German: Weiße Hand
TEXT.Italian: White Hand
TEXT.Spanish: White Hand

TEXT.English: Writing

I am greater than any magician, my pen more powerful than any wand. For inside it lies the laughter of every child, the tears of every man, the hearts of every woman, and the hopes and fears of every being.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Aldorien Silvermoon, Elven Bard.
TEXT.French: Je suis plus grand que n'importe quel magicien, et ma plume est plus puissante que n'importe quelle baguette magique. Car elle renferme les éclats de rire de tous les enfants, les larmes de tous les hommes, les cours de toutes les femmes, ainsi que les espoirs et craintes de tous les êtres vivants.[NEWLINE][BOLD]Aldorien Lunargent, Ménestrel elfique
TEXT.German: Ich bin größer als jeder Zauberer, meine Feder mächtiger als jeder Zauberstab. Denn in ihr ist das Lachen jedes Kindes, die Tränen jedes Mannes, die Herzen aller Frauen und die Hoffnungen und Ängste jedes Wesens. - Aldorien Silbermond, Elfenbarde
TEXT.Italian: I am greater than any magician, my pen more powerful than any wand. For inside it lies the laughter of every child, the tears of every man, the hearts of every woman, and the hopes and fears of every being.-Aldorien Silvermoon, Elven Bard.
TEXT.Spanish: I am greater than any magician, my pen more powerful than any wand. For inside it lies the laughter of every child, the tears of every man, the hearts of every woman, and the hopes and fears of every being.-Aldorien Silvermoon, Elven Bard.
